resp.text: Cameron we are so excited for you on this path of improved health and fitness! Thank your for sharing your great experience. We are cheering on your results!

name: Maddi Chappel
text: I did the metrics + purvelo class tonight and boy did it give it to me! I really enjoyed the workout and trainers that were there, they made it super fun while being encouraging and helpful. Definitely will be back! :)

resp.text: Maddi what a fantastic event today's collaboration was. We loved your energy in-studio and we appreciate you sharing your great experience with us. Can't wait to have you back!

name: Debby Thayer
text: Great classes!  Lots of great exercise and personal attention to detail. I have experienced the one-on-one personal training, the semi-private small group personal training sessions and the 6-week Get Fit Challenge at Metrics. Ike and the  trainers are so knowledgeable and have helped me move better! The nutrition is delicious and the plan keeps me motivated and pushing toward my goals! It gets better all the time and has increased my energy, my flexibility, and my all over health.

resp.text: Debby you have blown us away with your progress! Thank you for allowing Metrics to guide your fitness journey. The best is yet to come!

name: Akilah Alwan
text: My first workout at Metrics Fitness Lab was a great experience! The integration of heart rate technology into the exercises is next level. The staff provided personalized feedback and positive feedback throughout the session, which was very encouraging for someone who does not get in the gym much. I highly recommend this place. Support black business!

resp.text: Akilah we loved having you in studio and can't wait to have you back next week.

name: Sarah Speed
text: I really enjoyed my experience with Metrics Fitness! I learned a lot about form and had a good workout. I like the variety of exercises!

resp.text: Sarah thank you for sharing your positive experience about your Metrics Fitness Lab personal training sessions!

name: Kathleen Sacco
text: I started at Metrics Fitness Lab when I signed up for the 6-week Get Fit Challenge. The commitment was scary to me. I work full-time, have a family, and to top it off, it had been years since I had been in a gym.  I would go through short periods of trying to “get fit” but I could never really stick to a regular schedule, so I never had great results. This experience changed my entire perspective on health and fitness. The meal plans were so easy to implement, and I found myself excited to go to my workouts. With the smaller class sizes, it becomes like a little family. You get to know the people you work out with and they begin to support you through the challenge. After the 6 weeks were over, I was so proud that I was able to sustain something for that long and the results have kept me coming back month after month since. If you’ve been thinking about it, but always find a reason to not join, just do it! You have to show up, but Ike and his team will support you throughout the entire process. Thank you, Metrics Fitness Lab

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words it is such an honor to know that our team has impacted your life in such an amazing way. Keep up your consistent action!

name: Alex Muncie
text: My family has been going to Metrics Fitness Lab for about a year and have raved about it.  So, when the last 6 week challenge started, I thought it would be a good opportunity to see what Metrics was all about.  The challenge was great.  The training is individualized in a small group setting, which allows for fun competition and real results.  The meal plans are well put together and very flexible.  The results are indisputable.  Metrics does a tremendous job of getting the best out of everyone that walks through the doors!

resp.text: Thank you Alex for trusting us to guide the health and fitness routine of your entire family!

name: Brooke Akers
text: Super fun workouts with trainers who motivate you the whole time! It was a great balance of working hard, but staying safe! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Brooke, you rocked your first workout today! Can't wait to see you back in studio next week! Keep it up!

name: Aaron Blackmon
text: Metrics Fitness Lab has been able to provide the best workouts I’ve had in a long time. Their trainers and staff are very knowledgeable and attentive throughout each session. Highly recommend for the for the experienced and beginner.

resp.text: Aaron thank you for sharing your experience. We're so happy that you are enjoying Metrics, we love helping to improve your functional movement so you can live your best life!

name: Wendi Rush
text: I’ve been going to Metrics Fitness since the end of June. I’ve not only lost inches and weight, I no longer have aches and pains that I had from arthritis!!! I feel like at 61 I’m in great health and feel great!!!

resp.text: Wendi, we are so excited about your progress! We couldn't be happier that you're looking and feeling better than ever! You go girl!

name: Emma
text: Amazingly kind staff! Everyone who works here is extremely qualified and makes you feel welcome. I would recommend Metrics Fitness to anyone!

resp.text: Emma, we love having you as part of our Metrics family! We're so happy you feel so well supported and taken care of! Keep up your great work!

name: Survive Your Life
text: All of the fun of group training with friends, with all of the attention to detail of personal training. The semi-private training sessions are high intensity and very adaptable to differing fitness levels to make sure everyone gets an awesome workout. The expert staff makes a point to never leave you wondering what you're supposed to do next so that you can't focus on giving it everything you got.

resp.text: Turner thank you for your great observation and your meaningful feedback. We couldn't have said it better ourselves!

name: Gil Pierre
text: Metrics Fitness has been great for me. After a few years of being inactive and out of shape, I decided to give it a try. It has been exactly what I need. They adapt the workouts to your personal needs. They also take the time to make sure you are doing the exercises correctly. Also, the small class sizes create a supportive environment for everyone. If you’re on the fence about joining, I highly recommend giving it a try.

resp.text: Gil we are so happy to have you as part of our community. We are looking forward to seeing your outstanding results.

name: Whitney Crochet
text: I visited Metrics for the first time this week and really liked it. The staff is very hands on and knowledgeable. I liked the idea of being able to track my fitness progress using their heart rate monitors. I found that I could push myself more than I normally would just exercising by myself. Each class is different and you rotate through four stations, so it doesn’t get monotonous. Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Whitney thank you for sharing your positive experiences about Metrics! We are looking forward to helping you meet your health and fitness goals!

name: Laneesha Gilbert
text: This place is amazing. No matter where you are in your fitness level or what your reason is for wanting to get fit, the instructors are there to help and encourage you every step of the way. They not only focus on each exercise, but they focus on key body movements and making sure that you are doing the exercises correctly so you can achieve maximum results. I never feel like I’m on my journey alone. As soon as I walk in the door I’m greeted by smiling optimistic faces. It’s a complete over all body workout and I never do the same workout. I’m never bored and I always leave feeling like I have accomplished something. The classes are small and it’s nothing short of a family atmosphere. We laugh, we joke, we compete, but most of all we work hard. There staff has helped me understand more now than ever their core theme of “Consistency to achieve measurable results!” Try it I promise you will love it.

resp.text: Laneesha! We love having you in studio! Thank you for sharing your reflections and for being committed to great health! Congratulations on your challenge results and we encourage you to keep up your consistent action!

name: Mike Hales
text: My experience with Metrics has been nothing short of awesome! The staff is knowledgeable, kind, patient and truly go above and beyond to help you achieve your fitness and nutrition goals. Whether it's one-on-one training or group classes, everything is customized to each individual and nothing is cookie cutter. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Mike we are so pleased that you are having such an awesome experience! We love working with you and challenging you to meet your next goal! Keep up your great work!

name: kayla harbin
text: I just finished my two free workouts at Metrics and enjoyed them! I love the positive energy and I love how we receive personal feedback throughout the entire workout. I can’t wait to join!

resp.text: Kayla we are so excited to have you become part of our Metrics family! Your commitment to exploring what it means to train functionally is spectacular!

name: Mary Parsons
text:
Definitely 5 Stars ...I would say 10!
Trainers Kathryn and Mitchell teach an excellent and fun summer fitness program for youth. Children learn to listen and follow a variety of workout instructions, while building healthy minds and strong bodies.  Workouts are low impact, yet challenging..... definitely a hour well spent at Metrics Fitness Lab!

resp.text: Mary! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with our Summer Fun Youth Program! We love having your grandkids with us this summer!

name: Ruth Stephens
text:
Today's workout was a GREAT ONE, keeping me on point for my 6 Week challenge at METRICS FITNESS LAB (AUBURN, AL)!! If you haven't yet please go by and try your 2 FREE SESSIONS!
You will really enjoy the personalized service.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your positive experience! We are so excited for your incredible results in the challenge!

name: Ebony G.
text: I love the personal training style offered in a group setting allowing one-on-one attention to detail and form. I also enjoy that the exercises are varied each session minimizing monotony. The price is less than it would cost to have a personal trainer. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Ebony we are ecstatic to have you join our community! Thank you for your kind words!

name: Alicia Story
text: Great staff! Ike provides one on one assistance with posture, motivation and meal plans. The 6 week challenge was a great experience and I learned a lot about exercise and nutrition. I was so motivated by the experience that I remained in the lab and became a member of metrics fitness lab.

resp.text: We are so proud of your hard work! Thank you for your kind words!

name: Mitchell Lewis
text: Metrics is a great facility for both beginners and those more advanced in fitness. Isaac is a very knowledgeable man and does a great job conveying information to his clients. Everyone could benefit from what is offered at metrics. Very comfortable and friendly environment as well.

resp.text: Mitchell we are so happy that you had such a fantastic experience and you observed the high standard we hold ourselves to. Cant wait to see the progress you make!

name: Rachel Rusk
text: Metrics fitness lab is the perfect place for those looking for a new workout routine. The class sizes are small enough that you receive personalized attention, while still having fun in a group setting! The workouts are for everyone. You go at your own pace and complete as many cycles as you can in the allotted time frame. I also love that you wear a heart monitor so you can see your results on the screen in real time. No workout session is ever the same! Anyone, from beginners to seasoned experts, will love Metrics!

resp.text: Rachel, we're so glad that you enjoyed your workout! We strive to give all of our clients that personal attention in an environment that is fun and high energy. Can't wait to see you back at the lab!

name: Brie Benefield
text: I’ve completed a few sessions at Metrics Fitness Lab and it has been so great! Ike reached out to me to try it out & I am so thankful he did. They are an awesome gym with such a great team of instructors and employees. Honey was so accommodating with such a warm welcome.  They are friendly and make every exercise and experience personal and specific to each client. It is such a great workout and with the small group sessions, it’s almost like getting one-on-one personal training so the money is so worth it. The personal trainers are motivating, positive and educational. I would definitely recommend Metrics Fitness lab to all my Auburn friends!!

resp.text: Brie, your words mean so much to us! Thank you for the positive reflection of your experience! We can't wait to have you back in studio soon. Remember, consistency is key.

name: Libo Kim
text: I've been working with Ike for 3 months and have seen amazing results within the time. I have never felt stronger or healthier before. Ike is passionate about fitness and it shows through the energy and enthusiasm he brings to every session.  He makes each workout challenging, creative and most importantly, fun!  Also he showed me how to stay motivated and not give up!

resp.text: Libo, we are so very pleased that you are part of our fitness community! Keep up your great work!

name: Lisa Swift
text: I have been working out for many years and decided to try Metrics Fitness Lab in Auburn.  I really loved the class as it is a full body workout.  The instructors give each and every person individual attention as if it were a private personal training session.  The heart monitor is a great way to keep you motivated as well.  I highly recommend!

resp.text: Lisa thank you for such positive reflection of your experience with us! It's clear that you are focused on your health and fitness for life and we're so happy to be a part of your journey!

name: Lizzie Wilson
text: I have had the BEST experience at Metrics so far. At the end of January I won a 6 week membership giveaway and since then I've been hooked. It's hard to get a better workout than the ones we do everyday at Metrics. The trainers really cater to your abilities and push you to be better; the small class sizes help the trainers have more time with you individuality to ensure you are hitting your goals. I have seen measurable results and also just feel better overall!

resp.text: Lizzie, we are ecstatic that you have been loving your experience! Major kudos to our friends @scarletandgoldshop for collaborating with us on that giveaway! Extending a challenge spot to you was our delight, how wonderful that your results have kept you coming back for more! Welcome to the Metrics Fitness Lab family!

name: Cynthia Heard
text: The Metrics Lab is the best place by far to get training.  They care about your technique making sure you do it right. There at the lab they take in consideration injuries you may have and tweak a workout just for you. They also have delicious mean plans during the challenges.

resp.text: We are so happy you felt the care and commitment of our staff during your 6-week Get Fit Challenge, and now as a member  of the Metrics family! Keep up your great work!

name: Ansley Joy Bjork
text: I loved my experience at Metrics! The personal attention I received during my workout was wonderful. I was coached the whole time how to properly do all of the exercises. Really appreciated someone helping me during my workout! The staff is so welcoming and encouraging. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: AJ we thank you for being such a great Metrics supporter! We know how much you love to run and challenge yourself so it speaks volumes that you hold our program in such high esteem! Can't wait to have you back in the Lab!

name: Jared Porter
text: I love working out at Metrics! The training is very personal and intense. They teach you proper technique and it's amazing how much a difference that makes. I can feel different muscles being activated with the correct form over what I normally do without supervision. They definitely know what they are doing! I'm looking forward to see what their nutrition plan has to offer as well. I'm very excited to be working with them!

resp.text: Thank you Jared for sharing those words and your experience! You worked hard during your 6-week challenge, so it paid off. We are looking forward to helping you reach your next goals. This work is what sets Metrics' apart! Consistent Action, Measurable Results!

name: Meredith Downing
text: I was signed up by my husband without my permission. but quickly fell in love!  I love the atmosphere, trainers, and the whole concept.  The hour session goes by quickly!  Very happy with my experience.

resp.text: We love having you and your family here! You are continuing to get stronger and we are so proud of the sweat work you leave on the floor! Keep up your consistent action!

name: Denise Moody
text: I started out believing I was only joining the 6 week challenge for my trip to Jamaica, but I’m leaving knowing that I Need this for the rest of my life! The team at Metrics Fitness Lab gave me a clear plan on how to achieve my goals. The key is consistency! 😊

resp.text: Denise we applaud your incredible results, you worked hard and it paid off! The key is consistency, so just keep showing up,  your health is worth it!

name: Kelly Cashon
text: Metrics Fitness Lab is the real deal! I have been searching for a fitness "home" for a while and I cannot tell you how thankful I found such an amazing group of people! Here's what is different about Metrics - not only are Ike, Kathryn, Stephanie, and Honey some of the most passionate, uplifting, and helpful individuals I have ever met, but they know their stuff. Each workout is specifically designed to make us better movers in our everyday lives. I cannot stop talking about what a difference I have seen in a short amount of time and how I genuinely look forward to my training sessions!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly for sharing your positive experience with us! We are so grateful to have you, such a dedicated and absolutely delightful member in our family! Keep up your great work!

name: Jazmyne Jackson
text: I really appreciate the judgement free zone and instruction from a trainer to show me how to correctly do exercises. The circuits keep the workout interesting and the trainer to client ratio is amazing! I also enjoy the tracker board so you can see where you are during the workout. Everyone encourages one another and that makes it all better! I can't wait until my next workout in the Lab!

resp.text: Jazmyne! Thank you for sharing all of your positive experience about training with us in the Lab! We are so happy you feel the encouragement and support of everyone from the trainers and staff to the clients. It is a special thing to reach for new fitness goals with a cheering squad and that's what we strive to create!

name: Guy Rohrbaugh
text: Great small-group workouts. Tons of individual attention and focus on alignment. Just the right amount of push from Ike and his team.

resp.text: Guy we are so pleased to have you with us in the 6 week challenge! Keep up your great work!

name: Andrea Bird
text: Wow, this is an amazing place to work out...will be your only reaction when you get your fitness on at Metrics! It is the gym that you will brag about to your friends, family, co-workers, the checkout person in the grocery store, your nurse at the doctor’s office, flight attendant, and maybe some random stranger you pass by when you’re walking (due to the level of fit you have become, you will be surpassing everyone). Metrics Fitness Lab is the place where all your health goals can come true. This gym wants you to be the best form of you that you could possibly be to the world, not only physically but mentally and emotionally. You will in turn become an inspiration and motivation to all those that surround you!

resp.text: Andrea what a spectacular reflection of your incredible experience! We thank you for showing up, working hard, even on days that are so challenging for you (which are most considering what you face). Your positivity serves as an inspiration for all of the Metrics family and we are overjoyed that you entrust us with your fitness journey!

name: TheTiaraMakia (Tiara Makia Baker)
text: So I have completed two sessions at Metrics and I love it. I love how they tailor the workouts to your ability push you to do your best and go at your own pace but don’t overwork you. In the beginning they help you perfect your form to ensure that you are getting the most benefit from the workout. The set up is different from any workout class group workout class I’ve ever done, but it works and it makes it so much fun and each class is different. I love how diverse the classes are as far as age wise. I love the fact that you can monitor your heart rate and calories burned during the work out so that you can see how hard or not so hard you need to work. The staff is so nice and helpful and they take the time to get to know you on a personal level. They also have nutrition programs for you to follow as well as a way to track your progress outside of the fitness lab! I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

resp.text: Tiara, welcome to the Metrics Fitness Lab family! It's incredible to hear that you experienced such a personalized training session. It is our goal to have each person walk away with that feeling! Especially because everyone's goal is so diverse. Send all your friends this way, whatever they're working on we can help them be successful! :)

name: John Passailaigue
text: I was skeptical going into this place to workout when my wife drug me in there; little did I know it would be a game/life changer! Seriously people, if you are wanting over all better health, gain strength, lose weight, meet new like minded people, have fun and not have regrets.......try this place out! Ike, Kathryn, Stephanie, & Honey make you feel like that you are part of the group from the very first visit and actually CARE about you and your goals! After being in and out of gyms most of my life, I'll say that this experience has done nothing but made a huge and great impact on my everyday life, and it could make a difference in yours! I HIGHLY recommend this place to anyone looking to make a positive change in their lives!

resp.text: John Passailaigue, it is our absolute joy to have you in studio as part of our community. We applaud your commitment to better health, keep up your incredible work!

name: Rachel Schwartz
text: Absolutely loved working out at Metrics Fitness Lab! I'm a personal trainer from NC and had to evacuate for the hurricane. I spent a week in Auburn and worked out at Metrics as many times as I could! The classes, trainers, and members are so nice and helpful! Ike and Kathryn really know their stuff! They are great when it comes to correcting form and modifying exercises to fit any exercise level. Even though it is a group setting, the personal attention you get from the trainers makes it feel like a one on one training session.  I would highly recommend checking out Metrics Fitness Lab!

resp.text: We're excited to have been able to share the Metrics experience with you and over the moon about how it impacted you! During this stressful time and uncertainty about the hurricane in your area, we hope Metrics proved to be a good space to work it all out. Please stop in for a session when you're in town.

name: amory scott
text: Metrics has been an integral part of my weekly fitness routine for 4 years now. Ike is an excellent trainer who finds creative and safe ways to work through your individual injuries. Come here to find an environment that values lifestyle and daily health over a number on the scale!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your great experiences! We love having you as part of our community! Keep up your consistent action!

name: Kristina Breland
text: When you walk through the door, you immediately feel welcomed. The trainers are amazing and really help you with your form and challenge you to get better each time you go. I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone I know! It really has helped me to be become and stronger than ever. 💪🏼

resp.text: Thank you for your positive reflections about your experience. We are happy to be partnering with you to reach your fitness goals!

name: Allison Plumb
text: Beginning at Metrics Fitness is hands down one of the best decisions I’ve made for myself. Ike and his team are so knowledgeable and truly care about making their workouts accessible to everyone (while still remaining challenging!). Thanks to Ike’s careful attention to form, I can now work out without the knee pain I’d always experienced before Metrics. Plus,  it’s such a fun workout that the time flies and I look forward to each class!

resp.text: Allison, you are a gem! It's so rewarding to know we have helped you in your fitness journey and shown you what's possible without pain! Keep up your good form!

name: Daniel Gamez
text: Metrics Fitness Lab is a great gym with very attentive personal trainers that keep your form spot on, making every rep worth it. The staff is super friendly and very helpful. The small class setting makes you feel very involved, as well.

resp.text: Daniel welcome to to our community and thank you for your observations. We work hard to make sure each client receives a personalized experience. We're ecstatic that was your experience!

name: Amy Gayheart
text: Metrics offers a small group workout setting in a clean facility by staff who really take an interest in you.  Each workout is designed with a specific goal and unique exercises.  The staff is there to guide you every step of the way with feedback and encouragement. I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you Amy, for sharing such positive reflections of your experience with us. Our certified personal trainers work hard to give our clients a personalized session, and we're so happy to have encouraged you.

name: Caroline Pettey
text: I felt supported and motivated during my entire work out at Metrics! From the minute I walked through the door, the staff was friendly and the environment was upbeat and CLEAN. The unique activity monitoring and point based system to track your workout was really entertaining to watch and pushed me to work out harder - I couldn't believe that in a mere hour my calorie burn count was almost 800! Ike is an outstanding trainer and modified every work out to best suit my body's strengths and weaknesses. Totally recommend!

resp.text: Caroline thank you for reflecting your experience! We work hard to deliver excellent customer service, and the highest level of training! It is great having you in studio, your positive energy is beautiful and contagious! Great work, we'll see you next week.

name: Allison Moore
text: I have been working out with Metrics Fitness for almost four months and I LOVE it!  It is easy to find a class that fits in my schedule.  I enjoy the group training atmosphere.  The trainers are all wonderful and really help ensure I am doing the exercise correctly for max benefit and also have been very helpful addressing any pain or concerns I may have along the way.

resp.text: Congratulations Allison on your fitness success! We're ecstatic that you benefit from the personal attention that is the Metrics difference! Keep up the great work!

name: Adrienne Craig
text: I would highly recommend Metrics!! I love the small class personal trainer setting . It's interval training but with a trainer  to make sure you are doing the exercises correctly so that you don't injure yourself or have pain later. I've done several "fad" interval workouts and the trainers just throw you in the workout, at metrics they are constantly watching you and correcting you to make sure you are doing the exercises right to give you the maximum benefit for your  goal!

resp.text: Adrienne,  thank you for such awesome feedback! You're strong, and always come ready to work. I'm so happy you feel the personal attention and challenge by the trainers so that you get the most from your workout as we work toward your individual goals. Keep up your consistent action!

name: Erin Broughton
text: Went in today for my first session at metrics and loved it! I usually hate doing cardio, but the different phases made it easier and fun. Ike and Stephanie helped me to correct my form to help me get a better stretch and a more beneficial workout! Being able to track your heart rate status on the screens is also helpful. 10/10 would recommend.

resp.text: Erin, we are overjoyed that you had such a great experience! We look forward to being part of your health and fitness journey to help you meet your goals!

name: William Turberville II
text: I can't say enough  good things about Metrics Fitness Lab. I'm a newbie,and they have been very patient with me to date.  It's  a great workout, with positive reinforcement throughout the hour long class. They give you a nutrition guide to follow,and using the heart rate monitor keeps you honest to yourself, as the results show during class.  I really look forward to my progress down the road,and feel like Metrics Fitness Lab will show me the way

resp.text: Thank you for sharing such positive reflections about your experience with us. We are looking forward being your partners for training, nutrition and goal setting support!

name: Cat Bobo
text: I’ve been going to Metrics on and off for about two years now, and I love it. I’ve changed my fitness goals multiple times and they always match my workout accordingly. I got in great shape for my wedding and now I’m training for a half marathon. Great cross training. Ike is an impeccable coach who always pays attention to your personal needs - no matter how unusual they are. I’m a fan!

name: Margaret Braden Estes
text: Metrics is professional and excellent on all fronts! I felt safe and comfortable to ask questions and take things at my pace. It’s an incredible fitness lab and I haven’t experienced anything like it!

resp.text: Margaret what wonderful expression about your experience with us! Thank you for sharing your positive vibes and we can't wait to have you back in the lab!

name: Leslie Grounds
text: Ike and his team made me feel so welcome and comfortable from the moment I walked in. The workouts are fun, challenging, and change each session so you can get a great mix of movements each time. Ike is very knowledgeable and attentive, and he is able to customize every workout to each member’s fitness level.

resp.text: Leslie thank you for sharing your experience at Metrics! We hope you continue to benefit from the personalized instruction we offer here!

name: Teasie Williams
text: I have visited Metrics Fitness Lab a few times now and had an amazing workout experience every time! I love how personal the workout is and the focus all the trainers give to the technique of each and every person to make sure you’re targeting the exact right muscles. I find myself not only pushing myself to work harder but pushing myself to perfect my form in every exercise we do!

resp.text: Teasie, thank you for sharing your positive reflections with us! We strive to help people move well and often. Glad you're learning so much about what great form is! Keep working hard!

name: Jillian Breland
text: I’m 12 years old and I love working out at Metrics! They make it fun and make sure I don’t hurt myself. Everyone that works there are so sweet and want to get to know you! I definitely would recommend anyone to try it out!

resp.text: Jillian, your review means so much to us! We are so impressed with your movement and the effort you give! Keep up your consistent work!

name: Donnis Barkley
text: So glad my daughter invited me to join a clad today.  I love that the workouts are so individualized for each person's fitness level.  Ike, you're awesome!!

resp.text: Ms. Donnis you are welcome in the Lab anytime! It's our aim to make each session personal for everyone,  you can expect that each time! Remember consistency is key. Can't wait to have you back soon!

name: Andrea McAbee
text: It only took one workout at Metrics to get me hooked!  It was by far the most effective, fun, thorough workout I've ever done.  Having the pros there to help you makes all the difference in the world!  I love the point system and the element of competition in brings to the workout.  I can't wait to make this a regular part of my routine!

resp.text: Andrea we are so happy to have you and Dustin be part of the Metrics family! See you next week. Let's get to work!

name: Lana Blankenship
text: I love Metrics Fitness Lab! Ike and the staff are excellent and know what they are doing. They provide great workouts at every class. Ike makes you feel comfortable and it is not intimidatingly at all.  Metrics is similar to Orange Theory but SO much better in my opinion. I highly recommend giving it a try!

name: Gauri Deshpande
text:
I love the atmosphere in this fitness center.
you get a feeling of working out in a group yet the workouts are so personalized.
the staff is really helpful and want you to achieve your goal.
the place itself is clean and fun to workout in and you are encouraged to go at your own pace.

resp.text: Thank you Gauri! We appreciate your kind words and your great experience,  we are happy to have you and your husband be part of our awesome community! Keep up the good work!

name: Brittany Harris
text: After trying metrics fitness lab for the first time, I fell in love! Everyone is so friendly and Ike is very professional and knowledgeable. I’ve already learned so much about correcting and paying attention to my form in just the first two sessions.

resp.text: Brittany we love having you in studio, too! We work hard to deliver a high quality training experience, we're so pleased you felt taken care of! Keep up your incredible work!

name: Hannah
text: Upon getting married and moving to a new town I had let my physical fitness fall behind. I started with a six week challenge and fell in love with the individualized workouts and the friendly and passionate staff. I was pleased with my progress and decided to join! I am thankful to be a part of the metrics family who push me to be the best me!

resp.text: Hannah your bright and positive energy adds so much to our community! Thank you for your commitment to your health and entrusting us to partner with you so that we reach your fitness goals! Focusing on your nutrition isn't the easiest of tasks so we salute your efforts and celebrate your success! Keep up your consistent action!

name: Jennifer Sammons
text: Ike is motivational, trustworthy, & ultimately positive.  I have a customized Personal Training Plan and actually feel that reliable results can be a reality!  I have tirelessly attempted workout plans from several providers with negative results, if any.  Given Ike’s impressive knowledge of the human anatomy, I have a plan to regain improved physical health, regardless of a longstanding injury.  Motivation was never lacking: only the likelihood.  I now have both.

resp.text: Thank Jennifer for sharing your story. We are so excited to be your partners in health and fitness! Your positivity and determination will yield the results you work for!

name: courtney clay
text:
Metrics Fitness lab is by far the best place to go to get a great workout. The group sessions are small so you still get a lot of individual direction and there is no fear of judgement because everyone is doing something tailored specifically to their body ability and goals.

Ike is also extremely knowledgeable and patient. He not only explains how to do something but also shares why it is important to do something a certain way.

I'll definitely be back again!!

name: elizabeth Hartfield
text: I love Metrics and highly recommend!! Metrics provides a unique approach to training that is personalized while receiving the group energy setting. Perfect for athletes looking for injury prevention and cross training!

resp.text: Thank you Liz, we love having you be part of our community!

name: Joshua Sauren
text: Great Energy in this Facility. The coaches are very knowledgeable and pay a lot of attention to detail. Functional training that is very efficient and personal.

resp.text: Josh thank you for your response to the vibe of Metrics. We work very hard on our customer service and delivering the highest quality training. Welcome to our family!

name: Joshua Troy Cook
text: I took advantage of the free two visits Metrics Fitness Lab offers to guests. If you choose to visit, you'll be challenged with numerous circuits with each class, helpfully lead by your class's teacher, and better understand their method and motivation for their workouts. I'd encourage all to try it.

resp.text: Troy, we're so happy we challenged you and gave you a great workout and that you found our certified personal trainers so helpful and knowledgeable! We appreciate your encouragement of all to have the Metrics experience. We can't wait to have you in studio again!

name: Sandra Crawford
text:
Before starting the classes, walking into and leaving work had become a very unpleasant chore!
So I started parking closer to the entrance...still unpleasant chore!
I was very disgusted and tried of the situation.
After one class at Metric Fitness Lab, (I kid you not, just one class!) I noticed a difference. My breathing was not so labored and I was not as tired, walking in and leaving work.
This is what I've been hoping for...
I'm a heavy person but he tailors the exercises to my ability with notable results!
Ike, you continue to live up to your reputation man, and I'm reaping the benefits!

resp.text: Sandra what great news! These are the moments we live for. Real people with real results, celebrating their victories great and small! Welcome to the Metrics community!

name: Danielle Mason
text: Knowledgeable staff!! Great first visit. Really focus on the muscle mind connection.

resp.text: Danielle we're so pleased you had an excellent session with us! Can't wait to have you back!

name: Mary Maud Kirk
text: If you are wanting a fun and challenging workout with an instructor who genuinely cares about you and your needs - then Metrics is the place for you! I love the individual attention that they give you at every class - especially because I care about my form being correct! They will make sure you are doing every exercise to the best of your ability without injuring yourself and that is true care, friends! ❤️

resp.text: Mary we loved having you in studio! Thank you for being part of our community. It's our mission to inspire everyone toward healthy movement so you can live your best life! See you back at the Lab soon!

name: Kelsey Summerford
text: I’ve only been going to Metrics for a couple of weeks, but I absolutely love it!! I’m actually looking forward to working out now instead of dreading it. They really do personalize the work out to you, and I love the small work out classes. I honestly feel like I’ve been going there forever with how welcoming they are! Try it if you haven’t yet!

name: Charell Taylor
text: I recommend Meterics Fitness Lab to everyone.  Meterics staff is very knowledgeable, attentive and personable. I am participating in the 6 Weeks Fitness Challenge. So far I am having amazing results. My clothes are fitting better. I am more focus on losing inches than pounds. This year I wanted to make it a priority to focus on self care and invest into myself. Meterics has given me all the tools to maintain a life long healthy lifestyle. Thank You Meterics Fitness Lab!

resp.text: Charell we are so proud of the effort and investment you're making toward better health! Thank you for sharing your incredible personal experience! Keep up the great work!

name: Honey Folk
text: The personal training in this studio is of the highest quality. The trainers clearly have an excellent education and they generously share knowledge of corrective exercise, nutrition, and purposeful tips for achieving individual goals. They also make it a priority to engage each person specifically and reinforce good practice/ form. I'm sure that the work I do here won't end in hurt/disaster for me. I couldn't be happier and the pounds are falling away!

name: Alexis Corsentino
text: Metrics is AMAZING! I started out here after not working out consistently for four years. Everyone is super friendly and helpful. I’ve had amazing fitness/weight loss results! Metrics makes fitness FUN!

name: Kanisha Torrence
text: I really enjoyed my workout session today at Metric Fitness. It was one on one totally motivated and encourage me all the way. Can't wait for the next session.

resp.text: Kanisha you're a rockstar! Thank you for sharing with us that you had such a great session. We know it takes so much to be a mom and still show up for your workout! Each time you give it your all you get closer to your goals, and we're with you all the way!

name: Mary Fellrath
text: I really had a great experience at Metrics. Everyone was positive and encouraging. The rotations were fast-paced and fun to complete!

resp.text: Mary thank you for choosing Metrics  even when you're in town visiting! We love when clients make fitness their priority while on vacation! Way to go! See you in a few months!

name: Emma Strong
text: I am a college student in the area and I love Metrics. The trainers are very hands on and are great at correcting form. These workouts push me and I always feel like I’ve worked hard when I’m finished.

resp.text: Emma, you're a rock star! Welcome to the Metrics family! Your commitment to challenge your fitness is fantastic and we will continue to inspire you to reach your goals!

name: Lacey Kent
text: Metrics is absolutely incredible, and Chappy and Ike are the best trainers I've ever had. The workouts are full body workouts done in stations, and the workouts change each day. Due to the small class sizes, Chappy and Ike are able to focus on each person individually in the class. I've had knee and neck issues, and Chappy and Ike make adjustments for me during certain exercises to ensure that I don't aggravate my injuries while still getting a full body workout. Join Metrics and you won't be disappointed!

name: Tameka Floyd
text:
I have been training with Metrics Fitness for a few months now and I have not turned back..... WHY?

Ike is focused on helping every one achieve their fitness goals and makes every session at Metrics challenging (& some how fun).  My fitness has increased noticeably and I have seen improvements in my ability to complete more core exercise reps, lift progressively heavier weights, and generally push myself harder throughout each session.

I actually look forward to my workouts....

IMPORTANTLY:
- Ike assures that my techniques are always correct to avoid injuries.
-He knows how to motivate and encourage while understanding    limitations
- tailors sessions to meet specific rehabilitation needs
- Ike clearly puts a lot of time into designing the sessions which are full of variety.
-He has a thorough understanding of how the body works - you are guaranteed to work up a good sweat.

I will HIGHLY recommend METRICS FITNESS LAB - A small group personal training facility in Auburn.  The professionalism and passion for what they do is second to none.

resp.text: Tameka we are so proud to have you be part of our fitness community and excited about your health and fitness success! Thank you!

name: Kate Weaver
text: Metrics Fitness Lab is awesome! The classes are small and the attention to form is top notch. Currently participating in the 6 week fitness challenge and feeling stronger than ever.

resp.text: Thank you Kate for sharing your great experience! Keep up the great work!

name: Susan Kelly
text: The Metrics Fitness Lab is a great place to work out. You get individual attention and the people that work there are very kind and supportive. They encourage you to meet your goals.

resp.text: Susan, we are delighted to have you as part of our community and to hear that you feel so encouraged personally to meet your goals! We will continue working as your partner to take your training to new heights!

name: Bailey Little
text: Metrics Fitness Lab had produced, by far, the best gym experience I have ever had. The small group personal training atmosphere is unsurpassed, and makes it possible for the trainers to pay attention to everyone individually instead of just overseeing some huge class. At the gym, we wear MyZone heart rate monitors to track effort. This technology is truly innovative and pushes us to work harder. The best thing about Metrics to me is that the trainers really care. They do their part to hold you accountable, keep you consistent in your fitness and nutrition, and provide a fun atmosphere to workout in. I never leave Metrics feeling like I haven't been challenged. For anyone looking for a place to make big improvements in their health, give Metrics a try!

name: Debby Thayer, Realtor
text: I would recommend Metrics Fitness Lab to anyone regardless of age or physical abilities.  Ike’s meticulous concern for the right form for greatest effect and safety is far above any routine I’ve ever done.  Each client is treated with care regardless of one’s beginning abilities.  The classes are lively, educational and they work!

resp.text: Debby, we appreciate such valuable recognition of the training program we work hard to construct! You always give your all and we are ecstatic about your progress!

name: Claire Daniel
text: Metrics Fitness Lab is the best place to go to for any workout goals! I have been training with Ike for the past year and a half, and I could not be happier with my results! The entire staff is so friendly, and it is definitely a fun atmosphere with exercises that change daily. I would definitely recommend! :)

name: Shaniqua Evans
text: I started training at Metric Fitness lab in December and it has been amazing. Ike is a great instructor and motivates you to keep pushing, while working out. He keeps track of your health and stays in contact with you when you’re away from the gym (too long). When you leave Metric Fitness you feel great and motivated to improve your lifestyle.

name: Heather Johnson
text: I have been to eight sessions at Metrics Fitness Lab, and I have continued to be impressed. The trainers (I’ve worked with Ike and Stephanie) are helpful and non-judgmental. However, they challenge you at the same time. The trainers offer individualized help on technique and form which helps me the most!!

resp.text: Heather, we're so happy to hear that you are finding so much value in our training program! We appreciate having you part of the community we are building! Keep focused on the small incremental adjustments, before you know it, the big changes will happen!

name: Susan Crain
text: It's like personal training in a small class setting! I love how they modify exercises to fit my needs. Great challenges and excellent personal support. Made some great friends too!!

name: Shannon Bourg
text: Metrics is a phenomenal work out, personal training in a small group setting. Ike takes time with everyone and makes certain form and technique are on point. I had spine surgery less than a year ago and I’m so happy to have Metrics to get me back in shape. If you are always watching the clock at the gym, you are in the wrong place, get to Metrics, you will NEVER look at the clock when you are here!

resp.text: Shannon, we are so happy to have you as part of our community! Thank you for such an incredible review and feedback about your experience! Keep up your great work!

name: kyeonghwa pi
text: Great communication and leadership from Ike!  Every day a different challenging workout!  It's so motivating to see your heart rate, calories burned, etc on screen while you work out!  I would highly recommend Metrics!

resp.text: Thank you Kay for joining our community and for working as hard as you do! Keep up your great work!

name: sonoma rohrbaugh
text: I love Metrics! Ike's focus on alignment and proper body mechanics make for an informative and challenging exercise  experience. I love getting a great workout while working to train my body to move in a more functional manner. Highly recommend!

name: Carroll Rhea
text: Metrics Fitness Lab has all the tools you will need to get in the best shape of your life! Ike and Chappy provide the most comprehensive workout routines including tracking metrics such as heart rate and carlories burned. You track and log nutrition which helps one be aware of what they are actually putting into their bodies. By working out at Metrics Fitness Lab I have felt the best I ever have and I love it! Consistency is the KEY!

name: Eve Rogers
text: This was a great workout experience and it exceeded my expectations. I really enjoyed the workouts we participated in. I would recommend it to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your great experience! Looking forward to having you back in the Lab again soon!

name: Virginia Stilwell
text: Loved working out here! Amazing trainers and staff who are encouraging, supportive, and knowledgeable. Big picture approach to physical fitness and healthy eating.

resp.text: Virginia, you blow us away each time you step into the studio with your work ethic and drive. Thank you for the positive reflections, our trainers and staff are absolutely invested in your health and fitness goals!

name: Tenley Lewis
text: After my first 5 classes I am feeling the strengthening in my core and seeing the improvement in my posture. The instructions are tailored to address my improvement needs while taking into consideration any physical limitations. This program is taking my fitness to the next level.

resp.text: Tenley it is so inspiring to hear that you're experiencing such tangible results so quickly in the Metrics program. Keep up this consistent action and get even more measurable results!

name: Leigh Ann Parker
text: Metrics Fitness Lab is my place! Ike and trainers make working out safe and fun, and having a small class makes sure I’m getting one on one attention. This has helped me work out safely before baby, during pregnancy, and now after as I bounce back!

resp.text: Leigh Ann thank you for being part of our tribe, we love having you as part of our community! Your commitment to health throughout each of these stages in life has been inspiring to watch. You were in studio right up until baby Sully's birth, setting a fantastic example for all of us! Cheers to you, keep up the great work!

name: Andrea Howard
text: Metrics is more than just a gym we are a family! The workout is always intense & never boring. This is a place where you can have fun while working out and burning calories! I have never enjoyed working out as much as I do now!! This place is my get away & I couldn't be more proud to call it MY GYM!

name: BARBARA JENKINS
text: I was nervous because it had been a while since my last workout. But to my surprise, I felt comfortable and at ease from the jump. It was challenging, but not more than I could handle. Definitely a unique and wonderful experience!! Ike is the best! He knew exactly how to adjust to my fitness level.

name: Tyler Carter
text: Amazing experience at Metric Fitness! I have plantar fasciitis, which has made it hard to get back into running. Metric fitness has been working wonders with me getting back into running!

resp.text: Tyler thank you for such a positive reflection of your experience! We are so happy to have you as part of our community! Keep up your great work and you'll be back running pain free in no time.

name: Heather McDonald
text: Hands down the best workout in Auburn! The staff is amazing, the studio is super clean! You will always feel welcomed and leave knowing you’ve actually accomplished getting closer to your fitness goals!

resp.text: Heather, we are unbelievably appreciative to have a Metrics client turned friend in you! Thank you for contributing to the welcoming environment of the fitness community we call home!

name: Haley McAbee
text: I have loved my experience at Metrics! Incredible, personal attention unlike anywhere else! I always feel AMAZING after working out!!

resp.text: Haley! Welcome to the Metrics family (which isn't a stretch since you're working out with your sister)! :) We are overjoyed to be your partner as you work on your fitness goals! Let's get it!

name: Ally Yankauskas
text: I've been with Metrics for about a year now, and I don't get a better work out than I do here! My favorite part about this gym is the trainers, they really care about getting you to see results. They pay attention to how you do an exercise to make sure you don't get hurt, they give you ways you can step it up a little, and they even give you tips on how to eat healthier! If anyone is looking for a gym to try out, please come to Metrics! You won't regret it!

name: Allison White
text: Love this place. Been exercising with Ike for a long time and I love him. Metrics is a fun, non-intimidating environment. You wear a heart monitor belt so you know what you're getting out of the workout.

name: Jessica Ventiere
text: I can't say enough great things about Metrics Fitness. Ike and Chappy have created an amazing place to workout. Group fitness with personal training!  All in a comfortable, non-threatening environment. Love it!!

name: Eiman Alsadah
text: Such a great place for workout! The trainer who I worked with is an amazing and helpful. I totally recommend this place!!

resp.text: Eiman, we are so pleased that you enjoyed your sessions so thoroughly! We look forward to helping you reach your health goals and taking your fitness to new heights!

name: Rebecca Williams
text: Metrics Fitness is amazing!! I love the small class sizes and the feedback I get on every exercise. I leave feeling great (and sore) every time.

resp.text: Rebecca we are so happy to have you as part of our community of movers. Thank you for sharing your great experience so far and we look forward to continue as your fitness partner, as you reach for your goals!

name: Courtney Sharma
text: Love the variety of the workouts! And the trainers are always right there to make sure you are doing the exercises correctly!

resp.text: Courtney, our trainers work hard to make sure your workouts are fresh and new, but most importantly,  progressive building blocks so that your movement efficiency improves and gets challenged each and every time. Love having you here!

name: Karen Ho
text: I absolutely love working out at Metrics. I’m not typically a gym person but Metrics is by far the best gym I’ve been to. Classes are small so you always get the one and one training. Ike has been an amazing trainer. I used to work out at home and didn’t realize my form was wrong until I started working out at Metrics and Ike corrected my form. No need to look at any other gyms- Metrics is the one to choose!

name: Nick Skoneki
text: A wonderful place to go train and meet dedicated people! Metric will push you to be better and enjoy being healthy. I recommend going asap, because you’ll regret not being in great shape!

name: Holly Muncie
text: Working out at Metrics has been such a great experience for me! I thought I knew a decent amount about what I was doing at the gym, but training here has helped so much - improved posture, whole body strength, cardio fitness, etc. The staff is amazing and the atmosphere has helped me enjoy 5:45am workouts!!

resp.text: Holly thank you for sharing your positive experience! We love having you in studio! Clearly you are strong, but we are excited to help you push forward and meet all your fitness goals!

name: Blair Caton
text: LOVE this place! Best workout I've ever had!! So personalized too they really make sure each individual has the best workout and any accommodations they need!

name: Dani Douglas
text: Favorite place to workout! Always a new routine. Small groups ensure you get individual attention. You get a great work out and correction and advice for maximum benefit and no injuries every time.

name: Megan Thompson
text: Metrics is unlike any other gym! The workouts are fun, and the trainers keep you motivated to reach your goals! It's the best place to go to whether you're an athlete or just trying to improve your fitness!

name: Olivia Laing
text: Metrics is a great workout experience and it's a new workout routine everyday. The instructors make sure you are in correct positions and modify anything you can't do. My body has rapidly transformed over the last year since I joined. I would highly reccomend it!

name: Dariah Stephens
text: Living a more healthy life is such a challenge for me. I love how Ike and Chappy address the mental aspect of fitness, unlike any other gym. The workouts are different and exciting! I love Metrics!!!

name: Maria T
text:
I love this place so much, everyone is so nice, welcoming and helpful and they really do a great job with tailoring the workouts for your current level of excercise experience plus the classes are always fun and the music played is great👏👏😀
Update: I have been going to metrics for close to a year now. The friendly and happy environment combined with the professionality of Ike and his team keeps me coming back. I've lost around 50 pounds with proper diet and excercise thanks to metrics fitness😀

resp.text: Maria! We love having you as part of our community! We are happy to be partners with you in your fitness journey, inspiring you to work hard for your success! Keep up the your consistent action because your measurable results are coming!

name: Jan Boylston
text:
I absolutely love Metrics! When I first started, I couldn't make it it through a full workout without stopping to recover, but with the encouragement of the trainers I stayed at it and I am so glad I did! I have lost over 20 lbs and feel so much more in shape! Each day's workout is different so your body is kept guessing and you never get bored!
I contribute a lot of this with wearing the heart rate monitor and the trainer, Ike.
The monitor kept me honest and the trainers taught me correct form and encouraged me.
I'll get measured soon to see how many inches I've lost and will post it here.

If you need help getting into shape and getting healthy, this is the place!

resp.text: Jan your progress has been phenomenal to watch and we're super happy to be cheering you on! Keep up your spectacular success!

name: Haley Hawkins
text: Love this place!! Everyone is so helpful and really helps you reach your goals. Always change up the workout and I feel great afterward every time

name: Brooke Justesen
text: I’ve had a great experience here! The small class sizes help to make things less intimidating and the trainers are very encouraging and attentive.

resp.text: Brooke, thank you for sharing your experience with us! We love having you part of our community!

name: Katie Farquhar
text: I love going to Metrics Fitness when I am in town visiting a friend. Being a physical therapist I care a lot about technique and form when working out and Ike is great with making changes to your technique to prevent injury.

resp.text: We love having you! You're right, form is very important for achieving the best results, correcting any imbalances you have and preventing injuries as you continue training. We are so excited to be part of the transformation you're undergoing as a new bride. Keep up the good work, and we'll see you next time you're in town.

name: Herm F
text: I always feel welcomed when I enter Metrics Fitness Lab. Great Staff and a warm environment.

resp.text: What a wonderful compliment! We want to create a space where everyone feels safe, supported and motivated to achieve their health and fitness goals!

name: Sam Franklin
text: I have throughly enjoyed my experience with Metrics Fitness Labs. The staff are all very personable and make you feel comfortable in a safe environment. I look forward to continuing my gym experience with Metrics.

name: Garrett O'Neal
text: I absolutely loved the atmosphere. Everyone was extremely nice and I was challenged in ways that I never would have thought of in a regular gym!

resp.text: Garrett, we enjoyed having you in studio today! You worked hard and gave it your all! Keep at it. We'll see you tomorrow!

name: Christina Smith
text: Great and very knowledgeable staff with focus on “movement efficiency” for strength that is practical in day to day life. Definitely recommend for anyone on the fence!

resp.text: Christina we are ecstatic that you make such a determined effort to prioritize your workouts even though you have such a tight schedule! Thank you for choosing to be part of our community, and for these wonderful reflections of the program we have here!

name: Portia Williams
text: Love the atmosphere & motivation from Ike & others.  Would definitely recommend Metrics for those wanting to begin training...not working out

resp.text: We are so excited to help you on your fitness journey. We are so happy that you can already see there is a big difference in training and working out. Looking forward to seeing you in the lab soon!

text: I highly recommend . 💕💕

name: Caitlyn Davis
text: Workout Anytime Opelika is the first gym I have joined since living in Opelika, AL, and I have absolutely never regretted it. name: Alese Morgan
text: Perfect size gym that has all the equipment needed for a great workout! Roger was super helpful in identifying a workout program that I could do for each visit with thorough instructions and explanations. A nice hydro-massage always ends my workouts nicely    And reduces muscle soreness.

Alese, thank you for your 5 star review  😊.  We appreciate you  taking the time to support our gym today.

Mackenzie thank you for your 5 star review  😊.  We appreciate you  taking the time to support our gym today.

name: Suzy Flynn- Lechowicz
text: Very laid back environment,  they treat you like grown folks! I just wished that the tanning bed was accessible 24 hrs , I work 3rd shift and I sleep during the day, other than that it's an awesome and convenient place

resp.text: happy to see those 5 stars! Thanks for giving our gym some love! 💗

name: James Joyce
text: Exactly what the sign says. Workout Anytime isn't as big or well-stocked as Tiger Iron Gym, but it is cheaper and generally has everything a no-nonsense lifter could want. The $39 "rate guarantee fee" is a bit sleazy and truly nothing more than a delayed signup fee, they're short a couple 20kg barbells (there's a couple random 15kg ones that float around between racks), and the barcode scanner out front is a little janky, but everything works, you get 24-hour access, and the membership being good at other locations is cool. Another set of dumbbells might be good. This is *not* Planet Fitness in every way that matters, and that's a damn good thing.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the positive review! Your health & wellness is important to us – and we appreciate your support 💪

name: Brian Likins
text: Best gym in town perfect size and location, you could not ask for a better staff that’s always willing to help and constantly learning their self. Clean equipment and bathrooms. Keep rocking it guys!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of our fitness center. We value our members above all, and appreciate the recognition very much!  💛

text: Enjoy working out here with my dad.  Great staff!!

resp.text: thank you so much for the ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ review! We appreciate you  taking the time to support our fitness center today.

resp.text: Hunter, well thank you for the review even though you may have outed your secret space! Thank you for all you bring to our gym. Members like you make our jobs a complete pleasure!

name: Damian Lewis
text: Best gym in Opelika reasonably priced and has some of the best equipment in it. Also staff is friendly and works hard to keep it clean and sanitized

name: Robert Andrews
text: It's a good gym. It has heavy things you can pick up.

resp.text: Robert, thank you for your review, we appreciate it very much! We are so glad you close Workout Anytime for your fitness journey!

name: Trina Kent
text: Great staff

resp.text: thanks for the 5 stars! Your health & wellness is important to us – and we appreciate your support 💪

name: April Copeland
text: Great atmosphere

resp.text: April, thanks so much for sharing your wonderful review about our fitness center! Your 5 stars is confirmation of our daily efforts to serve! We appreciate you! 🥰🏋️‍♂️

name: Phillip Abston
text: Love it every time I'm here.

resp.text: Phillip,  thank you so much for your review!

name: Kolby Lee
text: Great gym and really nice employees

resp.text: Thank you! Your review of our gym is very much appreciated!

name: osvaldo lopez
text:
(Translated by Google) Small but has what you need, dirty bathrooms

(Original)
Pequeño pero tiene lo necesario, sucios los baños

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Osvaldo, Thanks for your review and we promise to earn that last star with cleaner bathrooms!

(Original)
osvaldo,¡Gracias por tu reseña y prometemos ganar esa última estrella con baños más limpios!

name: Gina Daniel
text: Gracie my instructor is knowledgeable and awesome!!  Facility is very nice! I enjoy very much taking classes here.

resp.text: Thank you, Gina! We enjoy working with you and are glad you're enjoying your training. Keep up the hard work!

name: Laura Rivers
text:
I am ecstatic for the opening of this local Madison “gem”! Gracie and Isaac truly go above and beyond. They are both, very knowledgeable and very passionate about the self-defense style that they teach.

If you are expecting this to be a “wax on, wax off” type of karate, think again! The personalized lesson was practical and relatable without having to paint a fence. And a HUGE bonus, both instructors are patient and encouraging! It’s absolutely all you could ask for in when it comes to learning self-defense!

resp.text: Thank you Laura! We enjoy having you in the studio and know you'll do great things.

name: Bart Roegner
text: Isaac is an excellent teacher. He approaches teaching martial arts with patience and dedication. I highly recommend trying Kenpo with MadCity.

resp.text: Thanks, Bart! We really enjoy teaching you and appreciate your dedication.

name: Matthew Eady
text: An amazing school that teaches a very effective system of self-defense.  Patient, caring instructors who take time to pay the necessary attention to each individual student.  Great for people of all ages and all levels of physical fitness.  I could not recommend a better Kenpo in the North Alabama area.

resp.text: Thanks, Matt! We really enjoy teaching you and love getting to share our art with this area.

name: Randall Rivers
text: Great experience.  I wanted personal training, not a big group.  They offer several different options so you can find the one that works for you.  Good central location, nice facility and friendly, experienced trainers. I really like their focus on practical self-defense.

resp.text: Thanks, Randall! We think you'll excel quickly in our private program. We can't wait to see your progress.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: Amazing place! The instructors are friendly and very detailed in what they reach you.

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! We're glad you're enjoying your training so far - we appreciate all the hard work you put in.

name: Farida Rennie
text: I just took my first self defense lesson and I absolutely loved it. I felt that the lesson was not only fun but also practical. I was able to get a good workout while leaving with skills and improving my balance. I've already signed up for my next session!

resp.text: Thanks, Farida!! We appreciate your desire to learn and can not wait to see your growth in Kenpo.

name: Sarah Preston
text: The equipment is great. Peter, one of their trainers, is fantastic. The tanning beds are high quality. I gave four stars instead of five because cleanliness could be better and now that summer has hit, it has been pretty hot in there.

name: P Johnson
text: My adult daughter has been at this gym 6 months and loves it, so I wanted to check it out.  The first thing I noticed is the easy access to the facility with plenty of parking.  The gym is well-lit and I felt the energy as I entered.  The front desk folks are friendly and helpful, engaging in conversation with those who have questions and offering a friendly greeting to those who just want to check in and get started. The ladies' locker room is clean and fresh smelling.  The gym is clean and organized.   Staffed 24/7.  A supervised activity area for children...  I can see why my daughter likes to be a part of this Crunch Fitness.

name: Nicholas High
text:
Management is super unprofessional. They don’t pay their staff enough to care. No commission, so the staff have no incentive to raise a finger, but they’re really great people. Plumbing is always down, from the sinks in the bathroom, to the water fountains. What gym, in the biggest city in the state, can’t fix a water fountain? It’s a cheap gym, and a good value for the money, but the management is so rude to both employees and staff that I felt bad paying the membership fee every month.

They “bought” a bunch of memberships from Gold’s Gym, and charged those people $30/month without their consent though, so what do you expect?

There was a guy caught taking pictures of women changing in gym down the street and the manager decided he could get a membership at Crunch for whatever reason, even as criminal charges were pending. Not what I’d consider to be great decision-making.

name: Jourdan Truth
text: Love the gym! It’s clean and the staff are friendly and make sure the gym stays neat! Also love that I can keep up with ESPN and the news while working out with all the TVs. Here for all the gains!

name: Christine Gaitantzis
text: Had a great experience at Crunch. It is spacious and clean with a lot of variety in terms of workout machines and options. Staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Earth & Sky
text: Excellent facility and staff was great! Much cheaper and more amenities than all other local gyms. Definitely worth the wait!!

name: Kenneth Enman
text: Go see Johnny and Kayla for a great gym experience.  Convenient location and nice mix of weights, machines and cardio eqipment.

name: Gator6
text: Great gym! Had a day pass, lots of diverse equipment! Nice people!

name: April L. Butler
text: Awesome new facility, tons of space and courteous staff.  2 floors of workout space, group fitness, and the best spin instructor to boot!  Really great gym, especially considering the price.

name: Christina Buchholz
text:
Great facility. Nice people. Reasonable pricing. Love the hydro massage.

Subpar children center.

name: Johnny Isbell
text: The best energy I have ever felt in a gym hands down. Tons of equipment and the staff is always friendly and helpful. Way cleaner than any other gym I’ve been to as well.

name: Lauren Muncher
text:
Wow. Just wow. Going back to planet fitness!

I went as a guest of a friend and I was not impressed.

An employee named I think Johnny, was super unprofessional and wasn’t wearing a mask during a GLOBAL PANDEMIC! He was rude to other staff and clients. As someone who has been in customer service for over 10 years I was appalled. He ignored clients and spoke down to women! This is 2021 for god sakes. Leave the misogyny in the 50’s.

The only redeeming employee was a blonde girl (I think her name was Emma or Emily?) she was awesome and I hope she finds a better place to work!

Planet fitness here I come!

name: Pamela Cartright
text: My trainer is excellent . The gym is mediocre. And the there are mistakes with billing.  If you are overcharged do not expect to be reimbursed.

name: Melvin Smith (Snap)
text: It’s a great place to workout and the prices are low! You can’t beat that.

name: Kaiser Hulsman
text:
I worked here from July-October 2020, if any customer saw what was going on behind the scenes of this place it would make them sick to their stomachs. Often times the GM and Owner would short people money on their pay checks and it was up to us on the staff to harass and remind them for days at a time to get the money we worked for. It wasn't just front desk staff either, the personal trainers were shorted even more money and would even be shouldered out of it. Finances aside the environment of continuous disrespect towards the employees was a daily challenge. As a male I did not have to deal with the sexist name calling but i did have to deal with inappropriate conversations about the female members who would come in and work out(From GM).
Very unprofessional, disrespectful and not a good work environment.

name: Abdul D
text: The gym is very good. Super clean! Everything you need for working out is available. Even when it’s crowded, I still can get the workout done. Friendly staff. And 24 hours.

name: Ken Sutherland
text:
Well equipped and a shiny new facility.
I didn't see many cleaning stations. Odd showers don't have soap or shelves. Good prices for memberships though!!!

name: Carlo Romano
text:
Don’t ignore the bad reviews. Golds was wrong, after being dormant, to then sell memberships, personal information and data - and yes, they sent emails. So what. Some didn’t get them, some had contracts that expired, and some weren’t even active members when they decided to go bankrupt and hide from their already unmanageable debts.....
If you’re  happy at Crunch - great. But I find the practice of charging people that don’t want to go to your gym, even worse. What’s even more frustrating is the manner in which Crunch (Hoover) acts about it. There is never a reason to charge anyone before communicating such. They had a golden opportunity to be the good guy and decide everyday, and at every interaction to be the opposite.
Our country is hurting right now - businesses have all the reasons in the world to be helpful right now and those business that don’t understand that - should be shamed!
Cancel Crunch

name: Laqhasha Reed
text: Because Gold's sold my membership without my knowledge or consent and because Crunch started billing me forty bucks without warning, my  bank account was overdrawn by $60.  If Crunch would have bought the Gold's location I would have considered staying. However, thank goodness I'm relocating to another city.  They should remember that prosperity without integrity will never work out in the long run.

name: Johnny Molden
text: Don’t listen to all the bad reviews because of Gold’s mistakes. I was a Gold’s member too, and with just a little communication the folks at Crunch easily adjusted my membership to their plans—which actually had more benefits for less money than what Gold’s was charging! Sadly with covid cases spiking again I needed to ask about cancellation (I have a high risk child at home), but was worried that I’d technically still be locked in my old contract from Gold’s. Again, nope, no issues-no questions asked and no pressure. I look forward to doing business with Crunch again in the future and will recommend them to anyone who asks.

name: Emily Stephens
text:
IGNORE THE ANGRY GOLDS MEMBERS

When golds shutdown in march, I received multiple emails explaining my membership would be transferred to Crunch. I contacted crunch before they opened and they provided my new billing date information and confirmed my account. They were incredibly helpful.

Since it opened, the facility has been well maintained. The classes are high energy and fun, and the equipment is top notch. They listen to their members and got more accessories for the different stations, as well as more benches. I see staff constantly cleaning and refilling the bottles at the cleaning stations. Tanning and the hydromassages are nice perks too.

While this gym hit some rough spots after opening (hydromassage and tanning beds going down), the staff has been incredibly apologetic and to resolve all issues.

I've visited this gym during different times on different days and some staff that deserves recognition includes Krissy (a manager), Arkin, Nick, Landry, a tall dark haired girl, and many others.

This place is awesome and they're doing the best they can with mess golds left them with.

name: Bradleigh Smith
text: This gym is so well laid out and has ALL the amenities you could be looking for!!! The staff is super friendly, shout out to the front desk boy nick who always is looking good! There is all the top of the line equipment, classes like cycling and yoga and there is also a hydro massage and tanning bed/ spray tan areas. Overall very pleased with my experience!!!!!

name: Marlin White
text: Very clean, spacious, and offers a lot

name: V P
text: Never been inside a crunch gym but have been charged for membership since July 2020. While many families were struggling financially during Covid-19, golds and crunch gym found a way to steal money legally from people. Doesn't matter how many emails were sent out by either gym this was calculated by both parties, they were in it to steal money there are no if and buts about this. What crunch did was buy stolen goods,  they wont admit it and point finger at golds for selling membership but can't take responsibility for being a part of the transaction. Crunch might be a great gym but they took advantage of people and tried to gain business by cheating members.

name: Saba Arain
text: It has everything you need + a great atmossphere

name: Sleepy Hollow Review
text: I have been to Crunch everyday since they opened and love it. Extremely clean and well lit. Tons of equipment and classes. The instructors seem pretty knowledgeable. In my opinion, the 1 star reviews are from people that are from Golds. Crunch bought all of Golds memberships when Golds closed. This is a common business practice. Should they have called, maybe but Golds could have as well.

name: Duncan Lawrence
text: A wide variety of equipment to use with plenty of floor space so you don’t feel like your right on top of other people.

name: Eli Brown
text: I am a former Gold's Gym client and was getting personal training at Gold's in Pelham.  I stopped personal training BEFORE Gold's shut down.  Nevertheless, Crunch charged my credit card a total of $285, $230 of which was for personal training, and I had never set foot in their gym. I never gave them permission to charge my credit charge. I couldn't care less what arrangement Gold's and Crunch Fitness made. I just know I never gave Gold's permission to give my credit card information to anyone, and I never gave Crunch permission to start charging my card.  When I called, they refused to refund my money and said they had a right to continue charging because they had bought the memberships from Gold's. I tried to explain to the lady that I had stopped personal training even BEFORE Gold's shut down.  Needless to say, they did not refund my money. Crunch Fitness in Hoover is perpetuating a fraud, plain and simple. I suggest all former Gold's Gym members who had drafts on their credit cards immediately check their statements. Crunch is outright stealing!!!! Believe me, they will not stop until more of us file fraud complaints against them.  Stay away from this gym.  STAY FAR, FAR AWAY!!!!

name: Lindsay Diaz
text: Crunch classes are so good. The teachers all give options which helps me!

name: Molly Feazell
text:
