text: Great gym. Been going there since 1987 or so. Kramer is one of the best people I know.

name: Michael Kirkland
text: Where to start...?  I have been in and out of Kramer's since I was 15 and trying to get right for football. Then rediscovering it as a 23 year-old college grad, and once again as a 31 year-old returning from the military. No matter your fitness or experience level, or your training goals- you will have questions. Kramer will have answers. If Kramer doesn't, one of his patrons will. Between Kramer and wife, Kim, you will find a depth of Champion-level knowledge in powerlifting and bodybuilding, as well as D1 athletic preparation. Across the spectrum of patrons- Ironman competitors, triathletes, college athletes, special operations military, law enforcement, et al. Bring your ego. Let someone there crush it- and then they will help you build it back up. You will be humbled, and become humble- and if you stay long enough, you will do the same for someone else. You will find that Kramer's Gym is very much a community within the community. If you are looking to train for the first time- I implore you to start here, and ask any question. Someone will have your answer- guaranteed. There is a reason Kramer's has stood the test of time- it is not a corporate-chain gym. Kramer and his patrons take genuine, personal interest in each other. It is home. I will never belong to another gym.

name: Gene Miller
text: Lots of equipment

name: Jessica Sena (Communications Consultant)
text:
CrossFit done right!
I fell in love with the constantly varied, high intensity workouts over 10 years ago when I first discovered CrossFit (in my early twenties). Eventually, I got out of the everyday routine and before I knew it, 8 years had gone by. Last February (2019) I got up the nerve to get back into CrossFit and found Oddity (formerly Nomad). I could not have chosen a better gym! No longer in my twenties and several pounds heavier than during my initial CrossFit days, I was intimidated to "start all over". But the coaching and camaraderie are second to none at CrossFit Oddity! A year later, I am stronger than I have ever been. The progress has been phenomenal.
CrossFit is not for everybody. But if you want the best workout (and community) of your life, can humble yourself enough to be coached (and love loud music) ...you'll fit right in at Oddity. My hour in the gym is my favorite hour of every day!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!  We love having you (and your dog)!

name: Mike Giles
text: Great gym and a great community.  Coaches are great a tailoring the workouts to fit my skill levels.  Everyone can do CrossFit and Oddity makes sure that everyone can be successful.

name: Lindsay Badiuk
text: Very welcoming and catering to modifications

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you in the future!!!

name: Lauren Sharif
text: I was a novice starting CrossFit and the coaches there scale to EVERY fitness level and are heavily focused on form. David does an incredible job coaching while maintaining a relaxed and fun atmosphere to learn and workout. The community this place has cultivated is a blessing to anyone that enters. Come drop in and try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We strive to make sure everyone gets a good workout and has fun while doing so!!!

name: Andrea Brooks
text: My husband and I joined Oddity a few months ago as complete beginners to CrossFit. We were intimidated by what we knew about CrossFit, but Oddity provides an atmosphere that is truly accommodating of all skill levels. The coaching is great, we always get a great workout, and we never feel ashamed of our beginner status! If you’re on the fence about trying CrossFit, come give Oddity a try.

resp.text: Thank you! We want everyone to get a great workout and feel welcome regardless of their fitness level.

name: Alex Kijowski
text:
Came for the CrossFit workouts, stayed for the workout story time.

Whether you’re looking for a box to call home, or a place to drop in to, you won’t find better than Crossfit Oddity.  They’ve got the best coaches around, and they emphasize proper technique to make sure nobody gets hurt, making us all better athletes as a result.  And they have YOGA!

THANKS ODDITY YOU'RE THE BEST

name: Dominic Zelenak
text: I've been a member of this gym for several months and it was a great choice. I would recommend this gym to anyone who wants to start or continue doing CrossFit, or who wants to practice their Olympic lifts. Class times are very flexible and there are open-gym time slots regularly. The staff is knowledgeable, welcoming, and receptive to your goals.

I used to travel the country for work and have had the pleasure of dropping into some amazing boxes across the country. I moved to Madison at the start of 2019 and joined Crossfit Oddity from the start. They are one of the top gyms in my books. The coaching staff is top notch, the community is better, and the atmosphere is so much fun!

if you have not had the pleasure of stopping in, then maybe you should! The people are friendly and very welcoming!

name: John Alexander
text: Great CrossFit gym without the ego. Will tailor a plan for anyone.

I've been a member for almost 3 years now and couldn't be happier. Friendly people and the coaches are top notch. Don't take my word for it - drop in for a visit to see for yourself!

name: Tim Hurley
text: I moved to Madison in early 2019 and Oddity (then Nomad) was the 2nd Crossfit box I tried in the area. This was a mistake it should of been the first one I tried but boy I am glad I did. From the moment I cam to the day breakers class everyone has been so welcoming and helpful. This is by far the best box in Madison and Huntsville area. Amazing coaches, programming and great member . If you're in the area and need a box come by Oddity

name: JayJay
text: The coaches and other members (#fitfam) are what keep me motivated and returning to Crossfit Oddity. Even after an injury, the coaches worked with me to modify every single workout so I would not have to quit. Being a part of this gym and family is what helps me stay focused to be a stronger, better person in all areas of my life.

resp.text: Glad you are sticking with it and we love having you working out with us!

name: Brad Henley
text: I have been part of Crossfit Oddity (then Nomad) for the past 7 years. My fitness wouldn’t be where it is today without my CrossFit Oddity community to push me and keep me accountable! If you are on the fence about trying Crossfit, I recommend giving Oddity a try. You will be welcomed by great coaches who care about impacting your fitness journey!

resp.text: We are happy to have you as a member of our community and as a coach!

name: Jessica Teach
text: This is an awesome gym and awesome community! The workouts are always great and there is additional programming geared at building strength and for RX+ . The owner and head coach is super knowledgable and spicy and strives for you to get the best workout for your capabilities!

name: Bonnie Beddingfield
text: Highly recommend! I love the personalized coaching we are given during workouts.

resp.text: Thank you! We do our best to make sure everyone gets some personal attention!

name: Chad Fowler
text: Great atmosphere of people. Class time to fit any schedule. All fitness levels are welcome.

resp.text: We are glad you found the gym to be welcoming.  We strive to make everyone feel at home.  Loud music, kinda sweaty home, but home.

name: Laura Alexander
text: Great vibe, great community, great programming. And they have YOGA!

resp.text: Glad you like the yoga, we are happy to offer it!

name: janelle cordova
text: Dropped in for a tough and fun workout with a great and welcoming group.

resp.text: We glad you liked the workout!  Come back anytime!

name: Charles Dean
text: Best Coaches around! This is my happy place.

resp.text: We are happy to have you!

name: Chris Lindsey
text: Great Gym and even better people that push me to get better everyday!!!  Come check us out.  You’ll be glad you did!!!

name: Jamie Russell
text: I joined CrossFit Nomad about a month ago and I absolutely love it! I am a beginner. CrossFit was extremely intimidating to think about even starting for me, but I knew I wanted to at least try it.  All of the coaches have been so awesome. They walk me through every step of each workout. I have been to several different class times and everyone has the same supportive and upbeat attitude. I couldn't have picked a better place to start this new journey!

name: Trey Stinson
text: You won’t find a better atmosphere to come hangout, get fit and make some friends along the way.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Dale Anton
text: The staff at CrossFit Nomad is amazing - they are knowledgeable and helpful. They teach and encourage the clients to do things properly and because they are so upbeat they get the best performance out of me. The "box" is well set up, it is clean and the equipment is well cared for. This is the most un-gym like experience I've ever had at a gym. There is no posing and the vibe is cooperation not competition. That's not to say that we aren't encouraged to do our best. In fact the way the staff models being good people who are very fit does in fact encourage me to do my best and a bit more. #nomadforlife #crossfitnomad

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Huge concentration on form here, which is the main knock on crossfit. Won't be dissapointed.

name: Janice Kluge
text:
I have been a client at “Chambers Total Body” for a decade and have recommended Mr. Chambers many times. During the time of Covoid he invested in safety precautions above and beyond. He continues to keep sterile environment and his individual attention for personal training is outstanding! There is 30 minutes between clients- for complete turnover.

I was in the studio when the two men came in that gave the ONE star review. They walked right in and did not say anything to the owner. They had materials in their arms that made them look like SALES PEOPLE. And that happens a lot! A LARGE SIGN IS ONTHE DOOR to wear a MASK! Anyone who would give a review like that- after just walking in without calling ahead and already breaking rules- is not really the type of person who comes to workout in this location. I have met many clients over the years. That review was just completely UNFAIR and should be deleted.

name: Meaux La Soule
text: extremely rude when me and a friend walked in just to ask about his services. immediately shoo’d us out of the door like we didn’t belong there. it ruined my day and i won’t be going back.

resp.text: I'm sorry your interpretation of our interaction was that you don't belong here and that you were treated rudely. Our business has clear signage stating, face coverings required. The health and well-being of our clients are extremely important and it's our responsibility to keep the space in which we work as safe as possible for them.  While, It's unfortunate that this rating is reflective of your experience it is in no way reflective of our services.

name: Gary Roubin
text:
Marlon Chambers is the consummate professional trainer. Whether you are 40 or 70y., physical activity is the key to longevity and quality of life. Marlon is able to formulate a circuit of exercises to tune up your core, strengthen your lower extremities and for men," keep you shoulders wider than your waist". And he mixes it up! The workouts match your increasing fitness, your mood on the day and the inevitable appearance of irritated joints and muscles. If consistency is you goal, you will enjoy the experience and be disappointed when you have to miss a session.
As an Interventional Cardiologist, I have a professional interest in fitness and health. I have been working with personal trainers for 30 years. Marlon is the best!

name: Val Walton
text: I am very thankful I have Marlon Chambers as a personal trainer. He is a great motivator and a testament that you do not have to have a hard, drill sergeant attitude to get fitness results. Chambers Total Body, LLC has one-on-one regimens that are designed to do what its name says work your "total body." You will see results, provided you do the work.

name: Anna Schmidt
text: I've been training with Marlon for 3 years now.   Along the way, I've had some major health challenges that Marlon has been instrumental in helping me through.   I'm now strong, agile, slim, and most importantly able to do all those things in life that I really love.  I really appreciate the one on one focus and the way he has individualized a very core-focused program for me.  He even puts my favorite music on and has it ready for me when I walk in.  The facility is immaculately clean and well kept.  The atmosphere is professional and comfortable.  I highly recommend Chambers to anyone considering personal training.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Jimmy Adams
text: Marlon Chambers is a great trainer, working to style the workouts to the client's needs. I have been working out with him Marlon for almost two years and enjoy it. Marlon is also very friendly, and funny frankly. I highly recommend him.

name: john nixon
text: I loss 20 pounds in the first month and the training has improved my energy level.  Marlon is a well trained professional . I highly recommend Chambers Total Body.

name: Paige Daniel
text: My husband and I are long-term clients of Chambers Total Body.  The customized programs and one on one attention is great in helping you meet your goals.

name: Jessica Wilkes
text: This gym is great! Best combination of challenging workouts and patient/ skilled coaching, the best crossfit gym around!

name: S F
text: The best gym in town with the most knowledgeable coaches to get you in the best shape possible!

name: Harrison Horton
text: As a 5-year Crossfit athlete that is a certified coach and has visited countless Crossfit gyms across the country, I will tell you that ALL IN Crossfit is a great community of like-minded individuals looking to improve their level of fitness along with the confidence they have in themselves. On top of the great workouts and coaching that you will get on a daily basis they offer many out of the gym events that help build camaraderie within the gym. Before making my decision on which gym to join, I visited each Crossfit gym in the area. I ended up choosing ALL IN because they were the ONLY gym that bothered to return my phone call and offered to show me around the gym before I made my decision. ***ALSO, ignore the unjustified 1-star reviews from people who obviously have no supporting evidence to back their claims.***

name: Mike Cahill
text: This is an AWESOME gym!  Great coaches.  Great folks.  A real feeling of community.  Athletes that encourage and push one another and have fun doing it!  Don't waste your time looking anywhere else...come join us at ALL IN Crossfit and get "Better Than Yesterday!"

name: Bert Schulingkamp
text: Started going here when I started college and would come home for the breaks. When I moved back home to auburn I was in search of a gym to get me back in shape and that offered a sense of community. All In has done an amazing job of getting me back on track with my fitness and offered not only a community but a family. I am thankful for the amazing coaches and members at All In and wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Kyle Donaghey
text: Exceptional place, people, and experience.  I started going in April 2013 when I was new to Auburn and I can say 4 years later that was one of the best decisions I've ever made.  All In has given me much more than just a fitness experience (although they are great at that too); I've found friends through the coaches and members and made connections that have helped me both personally and professionally.  The business model is pretty unique in the fitness industry; you can pay as you go (which is how I started) so you are not bound to any long term contracts.  As far as the actual workouts go, All In changed working out for me from a chore to something I look forward to and enjoy, and is often the highlight of my day.

name: Anthony Dean
text: Outstanding! Great people! Amazing workouts. Absolutely top notch

name: Kanesha Blake
text: I could not say more great things about All In!! All In has the BEST community in Auburn, hands down. All of the coaches and members are awesome and make the atmosphere SO welcoming & enjoyable!! Great workout. Great people. Knowledgeable coaches.  All In is the way!!! #BETTERThanYesterday

name: Katherine Israel
text: Great gym! The coaches are fun and knowledgable and the members are supportive no matter what your level of fitness is at that time.  Walking in the door helps you be "better than yesterday"!

name: Brent Miller
text: I have been a member of All In CF for 3 years and could not picture going anywhere else. Chris Harris and Shelby Levy, along with the other coaches will teach you and push you to be a better you. Love my All In family!!

name: Ken Natori
text: Well established coaches that cater to all levels of athletes and makes everyone feel at home and comfortable. Truly tight community that will make you fall in love with All In CrossFit!

name: Christy Garner
text: It is a place that you can call home!  The coaches are wonderful the environment is friendly and welcoming.  No other place I would want to be....

name: catherine Lowder
text: I LOVE this gym, the coaches and the members.  It's truly like a family.  You will find yourself looking forward to the dreaded burpees!

name: S Kirkland
text: I love the coaches here. They are very helpful and experienced. I highly recommend ALL IN with no hesitations.

name: Robin Roberts
text: If you are looking at trying crossfit, look no further.  I have been a member of a All In since it opened and couldn't imagine being anywhere else.  Stop by for a great workout and the opportunity be a part of an amazing community of athletes!!

name: Stephanie Huff
text: I love All In Crossfit! The coaches are the best!Whatever your fitness level is, they will help you and encourage you to be better than yesterday!

name: Libba Brannon Harris
text: I love ALL IN! It's a welcoming and friendly environment. The coaches are super friendly and very knowledgeable.

name: Maddie G.
text: Unknowingly was put on the "auto pay" system when I specifically asked to be charged to go for ONE month. I even double checked to make sure I wasn't on auto pay, because a friend told me that is how it works. A worker went online to my account and said, "thank you for telling me you don't want to be on auto pay, because you were. I will take you off." They DID NOT take me off. When I called and asked for a refund, they said that it was my fault and did not give me my money back!! Poor customer service. Put themselves before the customer first. Was really surprised and frustrated that they did not give me my money back and acted like everything was my problem.

resp.text: We pride ourselves in treating our customers like we want to be treated and will gladly cancel anyone's membership if we receive written notification within 7 days of their bill date. Our policy is clearly stated on the waiver our customers sign when they become a member. This customer was on our auto-pay system for six months before she contacted us asking for a refund. Out of courtesy, we refunded her one month of membership fees. We regret that she thinks she was treated unfairly, but we were only enforcing the policies we have in place and that were agreed to by her when she signed up.

name: Kathryn Gullatte
text: Great coaches, fantastic get pumped music, And people who have a passion for fitness!

name: Tracy Young
text: Knowledgeable coaches, clean gym, super people! I highly recommend!

name: Taylor Cooper
text: The coaches are fantastic and the atmosphere is very welcoming! The best box in Auburn.

name: john Israel
text: Great Gym for all ages.

name: Jeff Brittain
text: Dalton is great.  Well equipped box.   Friendly members.

name: Joshua Anderson
text: This is by far the best CrossFit box I have ever been to! The staff is ALWAYS in a great mood and the people are like family. I have NEVER had a bad day at this box. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who is looking to start or continue their fitness journey!

name: jonathan arrington
text: Professional Coaching. Friendly atmosphere. Great facility. This gym is the premier CrossFit gym in the Auburn Opelika area.

name: Kayla Casper
text: I am a traveling crossfiter and have been to many gyms across the states. CrossFit on the Plains is one of the best gyms I have had the opportunity to drop into. Programming is great, coaches are knowledge, and the community is very welcoming! If you are in the Auburn area and need a good quick work out stop by here!

name: Ryan Michael
text: I walked into this Box while visiting family in Auburn. I was/am new to Crossfit having only been working out for 2 months and I walked into The Filthy Fifty the day after Thanksgiving. The staff and owner were extremely nice and helpful with some of the movements that I was not familiar with. I spent a little over an hour here and had a great time, I will continue to attend this Box when I am visiting family. I would strongly recommend this Box to anyone that is thinking of giving Crossfit a try. As a side note The Filthy Fifty is horrible, but I would do it again.

name: Grant Middleton
text:
So my 3 stars isn’t based on the WOD. It’s simply based on how it started. I was dropping in since I was out of town from my regular gym and brought my friend who’d never done Crossfit before. As we walked in, we were told by a member to go talk to two guys in the corner away from the class. They then direct us to go talk to the coaches to get us checked in. As we’re walking away, Dalton (owner) asks if we’ve done Crossfit before and my friend says “no” as Dalton then kinda puts his hand in his face and says “Oh my goodness.” I was pretty shocked...as an owner of a box, you have the opportunity to gain maybe two members but after that first impression, definitely not.

With that said, the workout was great! The coaches were super helpful to my friend and we definitely got a good WOD in for the day. Potentially would go back, but definitely not for who owns the place. Afterwards, I heard a few other people say not the greatest things about the owner, so hopefully he learns some people skills and grow his gym more in the future.

name: David Heigl
text: Great staff, great community, owner puts his heart into the gym.

name: Brandon Rowland
text: Fantastic box. Knowledgeable coaches and strong community.

name: Jon Lubin
text: After 3 weeks with Shaping-U...the results are in! The staff does an outstanding job not just with my workouts...but my full nutritional and dietary plan as well. I challenge anyone to find a better value for your dollar. Very pleased and thankful I found this Personal workout. If you have ever considered using one...you cannot go wrong with SHAPING-U! 100% Recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback Jon! We work hard to take care of our clients and get them to their results!

name: VIRIDIANA HUBBARD
text:
I had heard of Shaping U for years but never thought I would actually need personalized assistance in working out. I would get memberships in other places but never really go, and when I went I never pushed myself to where I needed to be at.

Now I live further from Shaping U, but after carefully considering other gyms, I decided to check it out. I spoke to several of my friends who were/are members and I only received positive feedback.

The Shaping U team has been amazing, as well as the other gym members. Unfortunately with other gyms I didn't feel like I fit in and it's probably due to the fact that I really did not know what I was doing.

I had never received assistance from a personal trainer and my only regret is that I did not do this sooner. I pass countless gyms, and I attend at 7 am, and I am still motivated to go. I never thought I would ever say that I really enjoy this.

I'm not just getting the personal training to make sure I have the right form, but also coming up with a meal plan is incredible. I would have never thought that I could do this and I am. The trainers are amazing, they are there for ME. I don't even need to figure out what I need to do next, that is what they are there for and has been extremely beneficial.

I'm a 45 yrs female, I'm very busy with work, and because I am working from home at the moment, being able to get out to a safe and friendly environment means the world to me.

Joining Shaping U has been the best thing I have ever done for myself. I feel that I belong, I feel valued, and I know that they are there for my best interest.

Thank you!!!

name: Lily Stone
text: I love this place

name: Olivia jee
text: Great Experience with Shaping U fitness. Expert and knowledgeable staff!! All the trainers provide training in an ultimate and unique way. I really love this gym as I achieved desired health results. They also provide a diet plan which is very helpful for fitness. I would definitely suggest this gym to every health conscious. Highly Recommended!

name: Gregor Rex
text: No other gym in Birmingham can beat Shaping U. Their personalized experts do a fantastic job. I will never forget my experience with them. Completely removed my high blood pressure disease. Their every day workout tips are unmarked. I enjoyed every moment in Shaping U. I appreciate the whole team staff. Widely recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Gregor! Glad we left an impression...please come back when time allows! :)

name: Elise Montgomery
text:
I walked into Shaping U Fitness 6 weeks ago, fed up with how things were, knowing that I needed a change, not just a quick fix but a lifestyle change. Brad was super helpful with explaining the meal plan. Everything makes sense, and it won’t break the bank.

The trainers have worked me hard, pushed me beyond what I thought I could do. I went from having to convince myself to go in during the initial two weeks to looking forward to going after work. The woman who walked into the gym 6 weeks ago is gone, replaced by a stronger, more confident woman.

It’s a relatively small gym with group training sessions. Everyone is very encouraging and helpful. I know the “regulars” for my preferred time slot, not something I got from a larger gym. And when I missed one of my regular  days the accountability coach would check in on me. I really feel like part of the Shaping U family.

My 6 week challenge may be over, but I’m not done. I highly recommend Shaping U!

resp.text: Thank you sooo much for these kind words...you have done an amazing job with us...looking forward to helping you for much longer in the future! :)

name: James clark
text: The trainers here are extremely supportive. The ambience over here is very positive. The day since I have joined Shaping U, I have noticed remarkable improvement in my health. I am really happy to be a part of this gym!

resp.text: Wow...thanks James! We are looking forward to a long healthy relationship! :)

name: Annie Long
text: The trainers are very good. They provide a proper dieting plan and personal fitness training, which is helpful for achieving fitness goals fast. I have seen huge improvement in my fitness. I really enjoy going to each session.

resp.text: Thanks Annie...we have loved helping you and so glad you are continuing with us! Looking forward to a long positive relationship! :)

name: Lisa Roy
text: Most excellent Gym! Shaping U is the best for your all fitness growing challenges. Their Knowledgeable trainers really helped me to get over my body fitness challenges with their best boot camp service, personal training, and better body boxing.

resp.text: Hey Lisa! Thanks for the positive feedback! :)

name: Steffan Ethan
text: The trainers are very cooperative, polite and encouraging. They keep track of progress very closely for each client and maintain the work routine. And also guide about diet plans.

resp.text: Thank you! We love working with you! You have exceeded our expectations! :)

name: Andy Grian
text: I recommend Shaping U because the trainers there really helped me to achieve my weight-loss goals. It's been more than a year since my training is done with them but the influence my trainer exerted on me is still a part of my lifestyle. Shaping U really helped me make my life better.

resp.text: Thank you Andy!! We have love having you a perfect client for Shaping U! :)

name: Susan B. Cole
text: Best personal training facility provided by Shaping U Fitness. They helped me to achieve my goal of losing weight in a very less time. Doubtlessly, I would recommend Shaping U Fitness to them, who are in search of gym services like personal training, boot camp, or better body boxing.

resp.text: We have loved serving you! Thanks for the nice review!

name: Amy Mink
text: Shaping U is the best.  Brad Pugh is the perfect blend of knowledge, motivation and accountability.  I am a person training client. resp.text: Thank you for the five stars! Loved having you as a loyal customer.  :)

name: Jorja Shillinglaw
text: Very nice place with best fitness trainers! Right from the first day, my trainer guided me very well and I am seeing results very soon. I will recommend Shaping U for weight loss.

resp.text: Thank you Jorja! You have been doing an amazing job! ;)

resp.text: Thank you Douglas! Really enjoyed having you training with us! We will see you back soon!

name: Genaro Adams
text: Great ambiance! Best place to work out and have the best fitness training at Shaping U. They are completely loaded with the best exercising tools and equipment at their place.

name: Holly Heilman
text: I have been a client of Brad Pugh's for a long time, both personal training sessions and now, with the training application we use as I enjoy the flexibility. He is very knowledgable and cares for his client's success. I would recommend him to anyone looking to meet their fitness goals.

resp.text: Thank you  so much for the 5 star rating! Loved having you as a loyal client!

name: Mary Tinker
text: I wanted to find a trainer who would kick my butt back into shape and help me finally lose my pregnancy weight. Now with the help from Shaping U, I can run up and down 36 flights of stairs in just six minutes and I also have a healthier relationship with food and my self-confidence is dramatically improved.

resp.text: Awww...thanks Mary! You did improve alot in a short period of time! And now your almost to your 3rd phase of our Total body Transformation! And you look Amazing! :)

text: They really care for you to meet your expectations. Best for diet plans, fitness programs, and private training. I am a part of a private fitness program and I am enjoying it thoroughly.

name: Linda Castro

name: Arthur Thompson
text: I truly love this gym as I achieved desired health results. They helped me in such a great way to complete my fitness level. I would definitely recommend to everyone.

text: You'll get a decent workout for a good price but this is ENTIRELY dependent on what trainers are working there, and they come and go frequently. The commute from Birmingham is no fun either.

name: Pink products
text: I love this gym! been going for almost a year and it's always a pleasent experience. it's never intimidating like other gyms. Highly recommended.

resp.text: That is awesome Anderson! Thanks for this 5 star review!

name: ryan lively

text: Effective programs!!! My personal trainer helped me to get a shaped body much faster than I expected.

name: Carolina Lecaros
text:
(Translated by Google) Shaping U Fitness is what I was looking for years! It’s more than just a gym, they do more than just shape your body! They shape your mind and change your lifestyle. This is what has happened to me since my first day!

Brad y su genial equipo están siempre ahí para ayudar, motivar, recomendar, retar y cuidar de nosotros todo el tiempo creando una nueva y mejor versión de nosotros mismos. Ellos son maravillosos!
Las rutinas de ejercicio son fantásticas! Han sido diseñadas para trabajar in cada parte de tu cuerpo... lo verás! Al finalizar cada sesión te sentirás genial aun cuando tus piernas estén temblando!!!!
Todos son bienvenidos no importa tu edad, tu raza, tu peso, no importa si no hablas Inglés!!!! Ellos estarán ahí para ti ( como lo están para mi)
Yo recomiendo Shaping U Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you Carolina! :)

name: David Eckman
text: I travel, and pay extra for a nation wide membership.   I’ve been in 15-20 ymca’s in the last year and they have all been gracious and accommodating.  This one must be special, because they will not accept my membership, and will not give me any option to use their facility.

resp.text: We regret that you were unable to visit our YMCA facility during the pandemic.  In order to protect our staff and our members, we are currently welcoming guests from Baldwin and Mobile Counties of Alabama only.  We will continue to monitor updated CDC guidelines as more people are vaccinated, as rates of COVID-19 change and as additional scientific evidence becomes available.

name: Recep Kuru
text: Good and friendly employees but they need to check some disgusting customers. The guy spit at floor in sauna like an animal when he did chewing a gum , I already reported him and they known him . I believe they kicked him out .

name: Ernest Kelly
text: Love Gina's Total Body Challenges classes at Bounds Family YMCA. I've been taking her classes for over a year now and am happy to say I look forward to them every week. It's always fun, high energy and you get a great workout! Gina's the best!

name: Karim Harzallaoui
text: Great gym, but if they would open at least at 14:30 would be awesome

name: Cody White
text: Clean facility, lots of options, and Karen is the absolute best up front!!

name: Wesley Williams
text: Really nice gym but it has the worst hours of any gym I've been to.

name: Local Guide
text: Great customer service and welcome desk. 2 pools one indoor and heated another outdoors. Exercise equipment. Several Stories. Family environment and safe. Child Care. Excellent facility.

name: A Boyd
text: I came in as a guest with my sister who is a member. Wanted to get a membership but wanted to try a class out first. We called the day before and asked what all we needed to bring for me to do a class with her. Was told all we needed was $10. I get there with $10 in cash and then I’m told “oh we don’t accept cash” which of course was not told to me on the phone. But it was fine my sister asked if she could just charge it to the card on file. Then she asks for my drivers license that I don’t have with me because I was never told that I needed to have it. All the while I’m trying to remain calm even though this is very annoying because I did everything right and called the night before and asked what I needed to have and NONE of this was mentioned. The woman at the front desk was extremely rude and said “well your sister is a member and should have known what you needed to have.” My sister has never brought a guest before and again WE CALLED AND ASKED and were not told any of this. It was very disgusting and embarrassing the way the woman was talking to us. Needless to say, I’m not getting a membership there anymore. This was very disappointing.

name: Rachel Tucker
text: The group fitness instructors are an exceptional team. They’re all phenomenal teachers and community builders. For me, they’ve made the difference in my experience at this YMCA. Otherwise, it’s a beautifully maintained facility. The mission of the organization and the way it’s run make membership well worth it.

name: The Connor and Jacob Channel
text: Pretty decent gym. Friendly atmosphere most of the time.  Lots of machines although it seems many of the treadmills have glitchy TVs. Wish the pool was open later on weekends and cleaner...especially the outside pool. Pool staff has been unwelcoming in the past. I know they are mostly kids but they should probably have some training in how to treat the kids they are watching. We've always liked the private swimming lessons experience and those instructors have always been excellent. We used to love the Kids Night Out program, but they've made it less conducive for our child who is not into socializing. I wish they had some kind of classes for beginners especially yoga. Administrative people are nice but don't seem to be on the same page with information. Cleaning attendants are friendly and always hard at work. Now that my children are 8 and 11 they do not feel comfortable going in the ladies dressing room which I totally agree with but I do not feel comfortable letting them go in the men's area because there is no privacy for them. I'm not comfortable with them being exposed to naked men or having to expose themselves. Probably a lot to ask for a kids dressing area or family room. There is a changing room/storage room by the pool but I think it's really just meant for storage. It would be great if they would post the status of the pool on Facebook or via text. It's kind of inconvenient to get there only to discover it is closed because of a distant rumble.

name: Yosef Aborady
text: They have horrible hours of operation. Wi-Fi coverage is so spotty and when you do have a connection it’s super slow there’s no cellular signal because it is a metal building. Staff are clueless and who doesn’t open until one on Sunday it’s absolutely ridiculous. My advice to anyone would be to go to planet fitness for the same type of atmosphere half the price only thing you’re missing out on is a pool.

name: James Spivey
text: Probably the best overall fitness facility in Baldwin county. I’ve tried several other gyms and nothing really compares to the selection of equipment. The staff is also very friendly and helpful! I thoroughly enjoy lifting and swimming here.

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Love the staff and instructors!

name: Erin Adkinson
text: Great selection of classes. Large and clean facility!

name: Ash ton
text: Very military friendly! If you're active military visiting the area, they will give you a free pass for the time you're here. I'd recommend this facility to anyone.

name: Adam Manning
text: Great facility and friendly staff.

name: CHARLES Harris
text: Awesome place to work out . stay fit. I love it , family fitness center.

name: Jessica Redditt
text: I use this gym as a visitor and have been very pleased with my experience. Both the staff and other patrons were friendly and helpful to this out-of-towner. I follow a pretty extensive powerlifting and body building program and this gym had almost everything I needed, including a weightlifting platform! I highly recommend!

name: Virtual KRMZEN
text: Amazing place to go and work out or just relax in the hottub or swim in the pool! Amazing staff members that are very nice! It's very clean! It's very big and has a lot of room! They have very clean equipment!

name: Jim g
text: Great place, much better than downtown. I wish they would post a sign at the entrance and then enforce 10 minutes maximum per machine, no checking emails and texting while lounging on the equipment, chatting and socializing, rather than actually using the weights. The weights are for everyone's use, and using them is what they should be doing. Check your emails, text, and take calls in the lobby area. Thanks for a great place to work out. More fans would be a plus.

name: Zachary Dinkins
text: One of the better gyms I've ever lifted at. Nice people there too. I never had a problem with them

name: Robert Holyfield
text: Seen worse. Very crowded

name: Troy White
text: Probably the dirtiest most disgusting gym I have ever been to. My high school locker room smelled better. I don’t think the men’s restrooms have ever been mopped or disinfected. I only see the attendant using a broom and dust pan to cleanup. Wiping off equipment is not enforced. I find all sorts of goodies in the pool (band-aids, lettuce 🤷‍♂️). My wife and I had to say goodbye to our long term membership a few months ago as we just can’t justify the cost of membership vs the amenities. AND the fear of staphylococcus or MRSA. I don’t know how they stay open from a health code standard.

name: Brian Brey
text: the people are great but the facility is not up to date. The people running scheduling the classes do a poor job to say the least. the instructors that run the classes are great.

name: Rob Whitsett
text: Great gym. Needs to have more maintenance performed on the equipment!!!

name: Betsy Smith
text: Friendly atmosphere, helpful staff, variety of classes.

name: Trina Swan
text: Plenty of equipment, no parking available during peak hours. Swimming pool is alway inaccessible due to swim leagues. Open for only a short time on weekends.

name: Bert Waller
text: Nice, large facilities and decent selection.

name: Paul Klutes
text: Okay gym, some good instructors, awful christian music, and a constant stream of Fox News.

name: Marissa Ann
text: really needs to stay open till 10 pm

name: Trent McManus
text: Needs to stay open until 10 pm everyday. Needs to get EzH20 water fountains with bottle fillers. Filling a water bottle with a standard water fountain takes ages and doesn't allow you to fill it all the way up because of the angle.

name: Sharon Zekoff
text: Everyone is so amazing and encouraging. The coaches care so much and are so invested in my success. I have never been comfortable in a gym and definitely not a typical gym goer. However, Iron Tribe Homewood is such a positive environment. Even when I can’t do something there is always a way to modify and encouragement given, not only by the coaches but also the tribe family. I genuinely believe that I can succeed in making a life change in regards to my nutrition, physical abilities, and overall health due to finding Iron Tribe. I started Iron Tribe to be a better mom to my kids, set a healthy example, and not be limited by my weight and physical abilities in raising them. I’m so thankful to Iron Tribe Homewood for helping make this dream of a healthy lifestyle a reality! I can’t recommend them enough!

resp.text: Iron Tribe strives to maintain a positive environment, so we are pleased to hear that you were encouraged and pushed in your workouts. Making healthy life changes like nutrition and physical abilities are quintessential for a healthy mental state which will waterfall into becoming the best version of yourself. Thanks, Sharon!

name: Trisha Trigg
text: After having been an Iron Tribe member for many years, my husband and I had not been attending regularly since the pandemic.  After speaking with Chris, we knew the Prime program might be the answer.  The encouragement from Lauren and Caleb has been just what we needed.  Great programming plus diet tips that have made a huge difference.  We have also been impressed with the safety precautions and the emphasis on doing movements the right way.  The personal attention of Lauren and Caleb has been invaluable in our making progress in the workouts and in strengthening us in our everyday life.  I could not recommend the Prime program enough.

resp.text: Trisha, we love having you at the Tribe. While the past year has been difficult on a lot of us, it's great to see our members like you continue to reach their fitness goals. Thanks for your review!

name: Barry King
text:
I have been at iron tribe for nearly 10 years. It has been a great facility with great training.  They now offer a personal training component. After talking with Chris and Caleb, I decided to try this to work on some areas I felt were neglected. After a physical and dietary evaluation, Caleb put together a personalized fitness routine as well as a dietary plan. After the first few sessions, he adjusted the workouts to isolate certain muscle groups to improve my core, strength and stamina.I have been doing the "Prime" classes going on for three months and seeing a change in body composition. My weight has stayed the same but I have increased my skeletal muscle mass by 2 lbs while my body fat percentage has dropped from 13.8% to 12.1%.  My basal metabolic rate has increased as well.  I was skeptical at first but now I see improvements. I feel sore after the workouts but don't feel beat up.

Overall I am enjoying the Prime fitness at Irontribe. I would recommend Caleb as he is excellent at evaluating your fitness level and adjusting the workouts based on your personal limitations so goals can be met.

resp.text:
We love Caleb and we're glad he's been able to help you continue to reach your personal fitness goals! Your dedication to getting stronger and more fit is awesome to see.

We love having you at the Tribe! Thanks Barry!

name: Garrett Blaising
text: Biggest thing is the community - I look forward to working out everyday because I love spending time with friends and coaches who push me to be better! I’m in the best shape of my adult life and am so grateful to Iron Tribe for the opportunity and accountability to continue improving my health.

resp.text: Thanks Garrett! We appreciate the kind words and we're glad you've been able to CRUSH your fitness goals!

name: Jami Wadkins
text: I've been an Iron Tribe member for about two years and have seen great success thanks to structured program-based coaching in strength and nutrition.  I recently joined ITF's PRIME program because I have some specific physical goals.  After discussing the goals, the coach, Lauren Pursell formulated my workouts with progressions toward those goals.  Due to the low athlete to coach ratio, I get a tremendous amount of personal coaching toward my goals.  In just four weeks, I'm already achieving movements I previously could not perform.  I highly recommend Iron Tribe and PRIME.

resp.text: Thanks Jami! We're glad you're already seeing success with the PRIME program. Our gym members who are involved and active are who make our gyms so strong!

name: Jack Burnette
text: I have been a member of IronTribe for 10 years. After missing 8 weeks while recovering from abdominal surgery, I decided to sign up for the newly offered Prime program. My goal is to get back to my previous fitness and strength  level as soon as possible. I am very happy with the customized workouts as well as the nutritional counseling. My coach, Lauren Pursell has been very strategic in developing my workouts that are challenging and targeting my goals. I have no doubt that in just a few weeks I will be back stronger and more fit than ever.

name: Stan Felton
text: I’ve been a member of ITF for 9 years and I couldn’t speak any more highly about this program, the quality of coaches and the community. If you really are ready to improve your health and have fun in a great environment, this is the spot for you.

resp.text: Thanks Stan! We've loved having you with us and we've loved seeing you crush your goals!

name: Chandler Ancona
text: I started virtual one on one coaching with Jessica almost a month ago (because you know, quarantine life) and I have absolutely loved it. She’s been an incredible coach and able to use so many resources from ITF to provide me with a good nutrition plan meant for me and customize workouts to help me reach my goals. It hasn’t been long but I’ve already seen great results and know I’m well on my way to reaching them. I would recommend ITF, and Jessica’s awesome coaching, to anyone looking for a push to get back/stay in shape and feel great.

name: Jake Barnett
text: Just finished my 6 week challenge and could be more pleased with the  time that I spent here. The coaches are great and want each person to do the best that they can while understanding that each person is created differently. Not to mention you will get the results you are looking for with workouts that will kick your butt and a meal plan that will get you the physic you thought you couldn't have.

name: Melvin Upchurch
text: I was always hesitant to join Iron Tribe. I am in my mid 50's and I felt like the workouts would be overwhelming. I tried the 101 just to see if it would be a good fit. I liked the basic class so I joined. The trainers are excellent. They work hard to make sure your form is right to prevent injury. They always  know your name & they are warm and encouraging. All the members make you feel at home from your first day. But, the key to Iron Tribe is their formula pushes you to work harder than you ever thought possible. They measure and record everything you do for all to see. Competition is friendly, but it is real. You do not want to be the slowest or weakest person, so you will push yourself to do better. All the members are encouraging to each other. It has proven to be one of the best decisions of my life. Great coaching, nutrition and supplement advice, friendly people working together to improve their lives. I love Iron Tribe & you will too.

name: Danielle Wisse
text: Just over a year ago I skeptically signed up for an Iron Tribe 101 class fully expecting to be underwhelmed and out the door after the six week trial ended. Here we are 18 months later and I could not have imagined belonging to a place where I feel consistently challenged by knowledgable coaches and supported by such a community of friendship. Now I can't imagine being anywhere else!

name: David Patton
text: Choosing to join Iron Tribe has been one of the best decisions I've made.  It's helped in all aspects of balancing my life.  Iron Tribe has been the only fitness program that has worked successfully for me and delivers with fast & measurable results.  You get challenging group workouts with one-on-one attention from coaches that are invested in your success.  You also have access to the coaches & trainers for skill development, goal setting, and nutrition.  Avoid the attitude of "I could never do that."  All new athletes go thru the 101 program where Iron Tribe spends 3 nights a week for 1 month getting you familiar with equipment, skills, and proper nutrition.  Life's short, Live Healthy!

name: Sheri Spaine Long
text: I am currently in Iron Tribe 101.  Carrie and Caleb are truly talented coaches.  They break down every movement into easy-to-digest steps and take the stress out of learning new activities.  At 56, they have been key to making me comfortable and keeping me grounded during workouts – thank you!!  Burpees for both of you!!

name: Lucy Farmer
text: I start my 101 class at the end of this month. From what I've seen from friends that are tribers, I can't wait to get started! Everyone has had incredible results. Not only in there outside appearance, but they feel better. This is not just another gym. It's a life changing experience.

name: Jeremy Carter
text: I love Iron Tribe. I recently rejoined after a 4 year hiatus and I'm so glad to be back. Trainer, Matt Lavender, has helped me set some challenging goals and pushed me to achieve much more than I would have on my own. Mentally and physically I feel stronger than ever.

name: Justin Weaver
text: Best gym in town. Two highly trained coaches every class - and every one of them is friendly and motivational. Tons of classes every day to fit your schedule. Clean floors, restrooms, and showers. So worth it.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text:
This is the first Iron Tribe location...technically, it was across the street.
Amazing place for a hardcore workout.

name: Sarah Shaffield
text: Joining Iron Tribe 2 years ago was the best thing I've ever done for my health. I rave about it to everyone I know (I'm one of "those" people that can't shut up about it 😉). They've gotten me in the best shape of my life, and I'm still driven to improve every day!

name: Keith Jackson
text: These folks love what they do and they care about the people they coach. I delayed joining for 4 years with every excuse I could come up with - cost, available time, the commitment, and most of all the doubt that I would ever understand how to do all those mysterious Olympic lifts. All of my worries were misguided. The coaches are skilled both at challenging the younger, stronger athletes while also making newbies feel comfortable and helping those of us who may be further along in age learn, develop, and get stronger and faster, all while staying safe. And the cost? I wish I knew then what I know now - I can't afford NOT to go.

name: Angela Ginder
text: Iron Tribe is changing my life physically, mentally and spiritually!!  I love the workouts and the camaraderie.  Chandler, Matt and all the other coaches are great.  They make you feel good even during the workout!!  I feel more confident in my daily activities due to the confidence I'm gaining with the workouts.  Overall I love Iron Tribe!!  Ok Chandler 5 burpees for you!!

name: Margaret Scott
text: Painful; difficult; torturous. But the results are worth it. Big time for me. This is not a workout I would ever do on my own, which is why it is so beneficial. Endurance is so much better than when I started, and my baby fat is almost gone. Still more work to do, but can't think of a better way to get it done than at Irontribe or I would be doing that. No pain-No gain!!!

name: Gina Cox
text: I'm an over 50 year old woman who started iron tribe 3 years ago - the coaches are helpful in scaling the workouts and I always leave knowing that I've accomplished something hard.  I've never had any type of injury despite my age and prior lack of training!

name: Jason Lovoy
text: I'm a creature of habit which is great when you have accountability - At Iron Tribe you get that with great coaches, great work outs, and a great tribe of athletes.

name: Anna Kittinger
text: Hands down, one of the best decisions I have ever made was to join Iron Tribe!  The physical benefits are rivaled by the benefits of the community you find here. Invest in yourself through Iron Tribe - it's worth it!

name: Jeremy Allen
text: Fantastic coaching, safety first, results I couldn't have imagined.  THANKS GUYS!

name: Matt Bradford
text: Best coaches in the business, they are well trained and do a great job of giving that extra push just when you need it.

name: A Google User
text: The skills the coaches possess are only exceeded by their rock hard abs!

name: Sonja Doss
text: False advertising. Super expensive. Judgemental and pushy staff.

name: Michelle Shroyer Mathis
text:
I grew up being a competitive dancer, and I had never been overweight until graduate school when life turned into sitting around studying and then grabbing something quick and convenient to eat. I soon found I was not happy with my new body as I gained 20lbs, and running on the treadmill for 30 minutes a few times a week was not giving me any results. I signed up for the Irontribe 101 class having never lifted anything heavier than 5lb hand weights. I now have been a member for almost 2 years and I never want to quit.
I have lost 30lbs, made new friends, built lean muscle, started running 5Ks, become confident in my body, decreased my anxiety, and proved to myself I can do more than I ever believed I could. I love the sense of community at Irontribe. Having people to hold you accountable and cheer you on makes a huge difference in your progress. I love my coaches who have helped me embrace the paleo lifestyle and are willing to answer any food or health question I may randomly email them. I trust and respect my coaches, and they are a crucial part of my success. I am so thankful I joined Irontribe and become a better version of myself.

name: Shawn Mcculley
text: Nice small gym in Homewood.

name: maxfield mayeaux
text:
Page loaded.
maxfield mayeaux's profile photo
maxfield mayeaux
Public
9 mins ago
Arrived at Iron Tribe in 2013 after having worked out at the Y knowing I could not do all that much. You see I had a heart transplant in 2011. I regained some strength and conditioning but came down with pneumonia a year later and was on a vent. After not really being able to walk I slowing did physical therapy and was about were I was before. So I joined Iron Tribe and the rest is history. The greatest part is by far the coaches. I'm not sure how they are always in such a great mood. They can really will turn around a bad day. The coaches will improve your mental and physical ability with the solid understanding they have. All you need to do is show up and give a 100%. The other enjoyment is friends you will meet to compete with and pull you along. I hope to continue to improve and would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to get in shape.﻿

name: Caleb Bagwell
text:
I will be forever grateful to Iron Tribe Fitness for changing my life. A sudden move to Birmingham, AL introduced me to ITF last year and the rest is history.  I lost 60lbs in the first 5 months, my waist size has dropped 8 sizes, and when I started I couldn't run one mile and ITF helped me prepare and complete my first marathon!

ITF gives me the community and the coaching that I needed to succeed.  The coaches are professional and give me all the tools I needed from nutritional training and accountability, to personal attention on all the workouts to help someone who new very little about this stuff stay safe and get fit.

This group will meet you where you are and pushes you to be better physically, and just when you think you've seen it all you learn about WOD for water, or Tribal Wars.  ITF has giving back in its core.  They actually get that having a six pack is not the ultimate goal and that you can use your fitness to do good in the world and have fun at the same time.  I am very thankful that from the top down making a global impact is the heart of ITF.

I would highly recommend ITF.

name: Natalie Chastenay
text:
My experience at Iron Tribe was for the most part rewarding, motivating and overall a good experience. The coaches are great and work with and they are in it to help you  achieve all of your personal goals. MOST of the coaches are warm, inviting and friendly. My experience mostly took place in the Homewood location. Although I enjoyed the classes I did feel that the class I attended in the evening had a "clicky", "club-like" kind of feel to it.
They do offer a lot of products, paleo meals, clothing and other accessories branded with their name but I felt that was pushed a bit much. I also felt the more they started growing the more flashy and uppity some of the staff members became. I would occasionally see some of the coaches out and about on my daily runs and routines and it was rare they even aknowledged me.
The gym is way overpriced. After about a year I decided it was not realistic for me to continue paying the rate they charge. I very much wanted to continue crossfit and found a few other gyms, one of which I am a new member now, that offer more than Irontribe offers at a significantly lower rate. The membership I have now allows both me and my husband to go unlimited for the same cost of one membership at Irontribe only allowing me to go 3 days per week.
Would I recommend Irontribe? Probably not. There are just too many other crossfit gyms in the area more feasable and some offering even more than what Irontribe has to offer and at a much lower cost without making you feel like you have to belong to a club to fit in. Wearing makeup, fashion gym wear, and men who gel their hair to come to the gym..not for me!

name: Katherine Gorham
text: If I can do this, anyone can!  Great gym, great coaches, great partners and friends!

name: Jared Higgins
text: Dishonest and sky-high membership fees. Will tell you anything to get your money. Very unprofessional.

name: Kim Paige
text: Nice place but WAY over priced. They lie about a FREE 6 week course to get you to come in and sell you a $228/month membership.

name: Earl Hatcher
text: love it

name: Southern Realty Specialists-Gene Darden- Brokered By EXP Realty
text: awesome group and gym concept, highly reccommend

name: Tynley Baker
text: It's worth it.

name: Carol Fischer
text: Great coaches!

name: terry humphryes
text:
long time member and program evolves to
change for the better

name: Amy Marie Kelly
text: Very friendly staff and very clean facility!

resp.text: Amy  - Thank you so much for the kind review!  We are glad that you are enjoying your membership!

name: Leona Neill
text: i love this place there are many great people.

resp.text: Leona  - thank you for the kind review!  We are glad that you are enjoying your membership!

name: Will Wilson
text: It is, by far, the best gym in sylacauga. Every other gym in town thinks they have to charge way too much in order to stay in business. This place proves you don't. They have all the equipment you need and plenty of it for busy times. The staff is courteous, responsive, and seems to genuinely be interested in the physical well being of the members. They just have a good formula for success. Ignore the negative reviews on here. No business is perfect. This one is is too good to lose. Sylacauga needs more places like this.

name: Brad Dennis
text: Great staff that is willing to help and answer questions anytime. Clean and plenty of equipment. Machines for every ability, no excuses for not being able to find something you can do or use here.

name: Charlene Shealey-Heath
text: The gym itself was clean and very spacious. Great, easy to operate treadmills and bikes. My only complaint is I asked the staff to show me how to operate a few machines and give me a tour but was told they would do that when I became a paying customer. I had a 14 day pass trying to see if it was somewhere I would feel comfortable. I didn't get what I expected and haven't been back since. It shouldn't matter if I had a pass or had paid for services; if I needed assistance it should have been offered to me. I hope they don't do all visitors that way

name: Beverly Hughes
text: Nice set up! I opted for a trainer to be sure I wouldn't damage arthritic joints. Upscale system for measuring body and adapting training towards your goals. Good job guys!

name: Noel Hall
text: The staff is amazing but sometimes you definitely feel judgement by the other patrons

resp.text: Noel, thank you for your review. It is always our goal that ALL our members feel welcomed and fully supported at our gym.  While we are not aware of members judging other members, we  would hope  that  what you experienced was most likely distracted, preoccupied members in their own "zone" while working out. This could easily be misunderstood, and more than likely the member has no idea they are interpreted as insensitive.  We will continue to strive for excellence in all areas, and hopefully earn an update in your review! Thanks again!

name: Robert Fowler
text: Great staff, clean, showers, locker room, equipment well maintained, very fair price

resp.text: Robert , thank you so much for your review! We value our members above all and appreciate the recognition very much!  💛

name: SistahK 1983
text: I love this place. The membership fee is low. The gym is super clean. The equipment is amazing and easy to use.

name: Kimm Wright
text: I love working out here.  The staff is awesome and will Kick your butt into shape. Sign up for personal training with  Whitney, Ray or Tick Tec, or just go run your winter blues away.

name: Robbin Davison
text: Always a great experience!

name: Taylor Panneton
text: The best gym I have ever been to! Staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable and gym is very expansive and clean. Give it a try and you will be back to join just like I did...

name: Franchesca McKinney
text: I liked this place till I experienced otherwise

resp.text: Franchesca ,  we so appreciate you taking the time to review our gym, thank you! 🌟

name: Jackson Langston
text: Been going here for about 3 months. Nice equipment, always an enjoyable workout. Sometimes a little crowded, but never enough to hinder a good routine.

name: Jada Holland
text: These folks are awesome!  Very clean and good selection!

name: Barbara Turner
text: I love this place just wish there was one on Talladega and Oxford so I could cancel with Snap.

name: Christopher Nelson
text: Great place and the employees are courteous and respectful. I enjoy working out here.

name: Lena Booker
text: They care not only about ur weight low but also ur health.

resp.text: Lena, thank you for your review!  😊 😊

name: Alesia James
text: It's a great place, great atmosphere with lots of friendly people there is no other gym I would rather attend

name: Clark Patterson
text: Great place to workout.  Roomy and convenient.

name: large marge
text: We love it here. The equipment is new and good variety, it's clean, lots of space, the owner and staff are friendly, and I enjoy talking to the other members. Highly recommended.

name: Teresa Austin
text: This is a great gym.

name: Tadpole Mc
text: Great place and the staff is always willing to help!! Highly recommend!!

name: Walter Morrison
text: Great gym a Lot of equipment and staff is great

name: Colt Byrom
text: The staff and trainers are awesome!! Great equipment and very clean!!

name: bill durney
text: Awesome place I love it there great people  awesome equipment
