name: Gianna Anjanette
text: Really nice management staff! A sufficient amount of equipment to get a good workout in. Private for those who do not like to work out around lots of people. I just wish it was a little bit cleaner. But especially during COVID, I wipe down the equipment thoroughly myself anyway.

name: April East
text: Very friendly staff. Very clean

name: Ashley Shaddix
text: By far my favorite franchise of Snap Fitness! The gym is never packed, the equipment is always clean and tidy, and the atmosphere is so inviting. The manager Pam is always a sweetheart and makes sure everyone feels at home when they come in the doors and it really just puts you in the best mood. I’ve been going to this same Snap for a little over a year now and couldn’t be more happy! 10/10!

name: Crystal & Lindsey Wood
text: Me and my wife go. We love it. At night we feel safe enough to go. We are shy people so we prefer to go then. People r nice and helpful. U should try them. U also don't HV to worry about just anyone coming in.

name: Memory Williams
text: It is very reasonably priced.  Decent amount of equipment and free weights.  Also, tanning was included in my fee.

name: Peg Gam
text: A great place to workout at. It's open 24/7 It's a friendly and clean environment.

name: Andrew Gamblin
text: Poorly managed, new owners made promises they’re not keeping, they don’t take care of their staff. No one will ever call you back from corporate. It tools months to ever get my key working. I left and found a much better place to work out that actually cares about their clients.

name: Eunice Bluster
text: Friendly staff at the desk. Building was very clean. The equipment is up to date and sanitized. I enjoyed the trail workout. 👍👍

name: Tiffany Leonard
text: Were just like family here, always motivating one another to achieve goals.

name: Butch Royals
text: Open 24/7 and very clean. Great staff.

name: Matt Rolling Star (MattRollingStar)
text:
I'm not giving this low score based solely off the amenities provided at the gym (although a laughable number of machines were broken or in a state of shoddy repair) but rather the pitiful customer service I received. A friend of mine and I used the Snap Pass feature to get a paid trial of this gym and weren't really feeling the features provided and the fact it was a little bit of a drive for us.

So we kept the pass and planned to cancel. A week before our memberships were set to auto-renew we tried to get it touch with whoever operated this gym to cancel our memberships since the official website directed us to. We made multiple calls to the gym with no response or return calle and I sent several e-mails trying to see about cancelling. No actual response BUT I did receive a blank e-mail from them which tells me that they have seen my attempts to reach out them. They have already billed my account so I can be confirmed of one thing:

Whoever operates this gym is not in the business of self improvement but rather thievery. I wholeheartedly cannot recommend this gym to any person unless they have a desire to feel the sting of being swindled or receiving the worst customer service ever. A disreputable and disgusting business.

name: Doug Merkel
text: Great gym. Not so packed.

name: Christopher Nelson
text: Great place too workout

name: Dave Sudduth
text: I love this place!

name: Franchesca McKinney
text: Love this place

name: Wiley S. (Eye Say)
text: Good equipment, friendly staff

name: terra thornton
text: Love the atmosphere.

name: Franchesca McKinney
text: Nice atmosphere,very helpful, and clean

name: Sarah Beams
text:
The coaches- they are amazing and get to know you on a personal level and care about your progress.
The people you meet in the classes- that ultimately you bond with and become friends with.
I’ve gained muscle and my endurance is up! I love my Tribe Family. We work hard and play hard together!
All good things!

name: Kevin Coleman
text: I enjoy Iron Tribe due to the friendly atmosphere, cleanliness of facility, up-to-date equipment that is maintained, reliability of staff to start/end on time, life-long friendships made by attending, professional/business contacts and networking, positive attitude of staff, and workouts that are progressive and promote improved fitness.

name: Angelia Sprott
text: Where do I start?!?! My experience at Iron Tribe Fitness has been nothing short of amazing. I just completed the 6 week challenge, and it was one of the most challenging yet rewarding experiences I have ever been through. The coaches helped me find the confidence to keep pushing even when I wanted to give up! Some of the members would step in to encourage me to keep going when I wanted to quit. For the first time I KNOW that I have what it takes to live a fit and healthy life. Anyone at any fitness level and be great at Iron Tribe. If you can’t do something, the coaches will work with you to find something you can do. If you are thinking about giving them a try please do, you will not regret it!!

name: Taja Dotson
text: I started the 6 week challenge at Iron Tribe and not only was I surrounded by a motivating group of individuals the coaches played a HUGE role in it too! Every single coach there was beyond supportive and really made sure to help as much as they could! I joined right after the challenge because I fell in love with the energy that I got from going to a class. I would 110% recommend at least trying it, it is a great, positive,  and warming environment!

name: Michelle Davis
text:
I did the ITF 6 week challenge. It was amazing, and I would recommend others to try it!!

The coaches are very knowledgeable, helpful, and pushed me to be the best version of me I could be! They want you to succeed.

This gym (meaning coaches and members) are amazing! There is such a great atmosphere here!!

name: Hannah Garrison
text: Love this place! I'm stronger than I've ever been. The coaches constantly push you to do your best and you get great results because of it! Also, the community that you gain just by being a member is amazing. Iron Tribe has brought me so many close friends! Basically, I love Iron Tribe.

name: Sarah (Sarah Kathryn) Bonds
text: Iron Tribe Fitness is fantastic! The coaches are wonderful, the workouts are challenging, and you always leave feeling better than when you came. ITF is a family and they care about their athletes. Their 6 weeks challenge was hard, but one of the most rewarding things I've ever done. Extremely worth it and I miss them already!

name: Barry Darden
text: Iron Tribe has exceeded my expectations! In less than 4 months I have lost 35 pounds and am well on my way to being in the best shape of my adult life. I have a higher energy level with the ability to be more productive throughout all aspects of my life.  The atmosphere is completely supportive and includes caring accountability. The coaches at Iron Tribe make each session time efficient and tailored to my individual ability to provide a safe, effective pathway to fitness. There have been numerous friendships made with the other athletes.  I look forward to attaining my life fitness goals in the next couple of months at Iron Tribe. Iron Tribe-come get you some-

name: Hunter James
text: Great people, great results. I absolutely recommend Iron Tribe Fitness for anyone looking to kickstart a fitness program or to bring their fitness to the next level. The coaches push you to your limits and help support a holistic approach to healthy living. The ITF community will be there to support you throughout your time there. Go Tribe!

name: mohammad ahmad
text:
I’m so excited to try this place... when the time is right I’m coming there for sure!
And the reason I’m giving 5 stars is because of its concept, to me it is like an army concept sort of.

name: Iesha Chess
text: In 6 weeks, I lost a little over 20 lbs and over 3% body fat. My results speak for this place. The coaches and environment are awesome!

name: Hannah Morgan
text: I've been going to ITF Tuscaloosa since September 2014 and LOVE IT! This place is more than a gym. It's morphed into friends and family. The coaches really care about you - and not just your fitness level. They want to improve your life. Drop by or give them a call!

name: Kelly McDonald
text: I love it! I would not be in a gym if had not been for ITF Tuscaloosa.  They have been so supportive and encouraging.  The coaches are awesome.  Making drastic changes in people's lives.  Love you guys!

name: T Cicatiello
text: Very motivating, inviting atmosphere.  Also pushes you to extremes.  The staff genuinely wants to get to know you and what your goals are, not just your $$$.  Life changer.

name: Keelin McNamara
text: Iron Tribe Tuscaloosa is fantastic.  The coaches, facility, and community are like nothing else.  One of the best decisions I have ever made! Everyone needs to join this family!

name: Mitch Hansen
text: ITF Tuscaloosa is First Class!  This a top-shelf results oriented organization.  The coaches are highly professional and always positive.  I have seen them, first hand,  transform lives - both body and mind.  Regardless of age or shape, they come along side and help you. Kanon Burt, and the rest of the coaches, understand the importance of meeting you where you are at in your journey to bring about a sustainable change. You will love the culture!

name: Tim Skinner
text: Great place to get a quick workout in. Great coaches.

name: Rebekah Gaines
text: I've really enjoyed being a part of Iron Tribe and working out with everyone is awesome. Have definitely seen results and can't wait to see more.

name: Tim Crosson
text:
As of 01/17/2019 this is the current condition of thos gym(pictures I submitted).I joined this gym franchise due to frequent job travel. It's slowly becoming obsolete. Tuscaloosa recently closed without warning. Oxford, AL is in poor condition as well. Find another gym. I'm looking for other options.

Note: I didn't leave these notes in the Gym. However,  I fully support whomever did write these notes.

name: Jessica Rogers
text:
I really used to love this quaint little gym.  It's easy to get to and not super crowded and the equipment does what I need it to do.....BUT ever since the new owners bought it last year, it's gone downhill quickly.  Repairs are never made to equipment, unless one of the trainers takes it upon themselves to do it.

Two elliptical machines have had "Maintenance has been called" for over 9 months now.  Their idea of repairing pads from normal wear and tear is to use matching duct tape to cover the rips.  AC is constantly going out and the latest insult to injury is that the power has been out in the cardio and classroom for at least 4 days now.  One treadmill and a couple of bikes work.

I really love the convenience of the gym and most of the people that go there are nice and friendly and the two ladies that I've seen working there are always nice.  I keep hoping that one day enough will be enough and they'll put some money back into the gym, but..........

name: Frank Fowler
text: I am a Snap Member out of town and have been 1 for over 8 years. Drove 20 minutes to this gym just for the door NOT to unlock. This unacceptable! If you are out of town, I would not waist time coming this. This is the 2nd time I have tried a Birmingham area Snap and for some reason the card just doesn’t work. One of the benefits of Snap is having access to other SNAPS!

name: Jeremy
text: Do not under any circumstances join this gym. First off, you won't be able to do it in person because no one works there. If you choose to join online, you will get a access card in the mail that doesn't work because there is no one there to activate. Snap Fitness has the worst customer service of any corporation I've encountered. Just go somewhere else.

name: Joseph
text: I love the 24/7 accessibility and Tom and Chelaine do a great job!  Snap Fitness also offers exercise and yoga classes and it's a really convenient location.

name: Sam Clemons
text: Manager is never there. Some Cardio equipment has been out of order for over 6 months. They can’t afford batteries for the remotes for the television.

name: John Randall
text: I enjoy Karen is a sweet helper at the gym.

name: Tim Gobel
text: I worked here for six years. And it's the first time that I've been back in about five or six years. The equipment is still the same equipment. Half the lights were out in the ceilings and the equipment was very dirty. Was very disappointing to see this become this way.

name: Morris Flurry
text: A good place to workout.

name: Jim Brown
text: Best place to work out!

name: christa lodico
text: Convenient

name: Des2BFit
text: I’m curious the only reason I’m putting a one star currently is because they haven’t left any information of why the gym is currently close. They didn’t let me know in advance so I can stop my membership. I actually like this gym but I am wondering what is going on and why they haven’t open the gym back up ??? Anyone has an answer???

name: Copper Scales
text:
Its a decent gym. Havent had any issues with management and its always been decently clean. Fix the temperature/humidity problem and it'd be 5 stars.

You cannot however use this gym as they refuse to put in proper AC and insist on using sparsely placed floor fans instead. This just doesn't cut it in a climate where I've seen 80° in december, let alone when it hits 100° in the summer with crazy high humidity year round.

name: janay chatmon
text: This is by far my favorite gym in town and I've been to them all. Staff is amazing and the overall environment is very welcoming. I love the sauna and recently they have updated most of their equipment. Happy member of Team Alpha keep up the great work guys.

name: Brian Rosenthal
text: They just shut down ..no notice no nothing..stole all our money...owner is a theif. New owners good luck.

name: Jeff Brunje
text:
My daughter is extremely competitive in BJJ,and was not getting what she needed at another gym she was at,so she tried it here and from day 1 knew it offered more than just "a belt".
Coach Kevin has a ton drive,knowledge,and definitely instills that in his students.She is now a full time student,and we are 100% confident in her training.In 5 years and 3 gyms she has found a main.

name: Mindy Joyner
text: Very nice workout equipment  . Staff are very helpful and friendly. They also have a really wonderful daycare.  I would totally recommend this center for Adults and kids .

name: Windy Joyner
text: This gym has come a long way and keeps getting better. Constantly upgrading equipment and lots of great classes and instructors. I love it.

name: Tiffany Garcia
text: I love this gym,everyone is so nice . Coaches /Trainers  are so helpful. I definitely recommend this gym!💪👊

name: Cassie Farr
text: Great personal trainers, phenomenal jiujitsu/Muay Thai/ MMA classes with a great coach. Great atmosphere. There is something for everyone, from Zumba to kids classes.

name: Jacob Katzev
text: Great place to train MMA and Jiu-Jitsu or overall just getting in shape the equipment is great.

name: Adam R
text: My boys and I train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Muay Thai here and love it!

name: Darkseid
text: Great place to get in shape with plenty of options. You have Jiu-Jitsu classes, Muay Thai, Boxing, Zumba and a daycare to watch your Rugrats to give you time to get in shape. Those are just a few that I know of off the top of my head. Can't beat the price with all of those options with a nice gym with a wide verity of machines and free weights to choose from. My only complaint is the bathrooms could be cleaner and restocked more other then that I'd put it at 5 stars! Love the place!

name: Ashley Floreno
text: Tried to cancel my membership numerous times and was getting told different information by different employees. Nobody has a clue what’s going on. I got emails daily about failed attempts to pull my membership fee for about 2 weeks. Now got an email of confirmation of payments. Waiting for it to clear my account so I can go in and raise hell. Gym is trashy and childcare is horrible. Every time I went to pick up my kids the workers were on their phones, not paying attention to the kids.

name: aresvp12
text: Best jujitsu gym near Fort Rucker.

name: Angela Murphy
text: Very clean! Friendly, helpful staff and instructors that are very patient and kid friendly!

name: H Buckits
text: Only been a member for a week and my experience has been nothing but positive. Gym is always clean and neat. Nice variety of equipment. Very helpful staff.

name: Arrow
text: The gym itself is a nice place to workout and there is a variety of machines you can use for workouts. The staff and management on the other hand is a joke. They simply do not care about solving a problem they caused and they will also lie to you about fixing it.

name: Russell Shimunek
text: I have been going here for nine years, since it was gold’s. This place has gone downhill under the new management. Not very clean, especially bathrooms. When they do clean the bathroom, it is during the day, so you have to pee and they have it closed. Out of the 8-10 treadmills, 2 no joke, 2 actually work properly. Rates just went up again. They are charging premium rates for a mid-level product.

name: JINJOO BOK
text: If you want to train bjj or mma, this place is for you.

name: Brittany Mullins
text: Worst gym around. I would not recommend this facility to anyone. Save your money and time.Management is a joke and staff is just as bad. Lying to  members about head lice in nursery and threatening employees jobs if they tell the truth. Taking the old employees out slowly and bringing in their "Pack". Please go anywhere but there. Planet Fitness is way cheaper and much better.

name: Brian Lee
text: The worst gym in enterprise and surrounding area.  People check your accounts they double charge you and will not refund your money.  They raise the membership and do not inform you.  Since it was gold gym and then enterprise fitness.  The gym has went down hill fast.  The staff has no clue on how a gym should be run.  Terrible place I would not recommend this place to anyone.

name: C J
text:
-people that are leaving nasty comments were not the greatest of people to deal with.
The gym has come a long way and so much money has been put into bringing this place back to life. No one truly knows the behind the scenes events and how hard we try to accommodate to everyone’s needs. However, the previous management was awful. I will agree with that. Too busy with personal life and not enough focus on the gym. That has changed and it’s only up from here. We have brought back the 7 day FREE trial so come on in and get your own expierence to share with the community! Merry Chrismas y’all! 🎄🍭🖤

name: Sharonica Daniels
text: Worst gym experience ever.  Manager was higher than a kite when checking me in.  Staff had no clue about what classes were being held and when.  Absolutely a waste of your money.  Go to Planet Fitness and save your time and money!

name: Taylor Morris
text: Worst place to work. So unprofessional. Staff is rude and has no idea what they are talking about, doing or even selling. Staff leaves front desk unattended. Managers harass they're  subordinates as well as customers. The managers are spoiled children of the co-owners who are being given a huge freebie in life.

name: RiShawn Foster
text: Great place and friendly staff

name: Faith Dream
text: Team Alpha has an amazing crew, amazing classes, and amazing equipment I couldn't imagine going to a different gym

name: Cam W
text: New equipment and always open, only real gym in the area for lifting.

its the best gym best boxing coaches best
zumba classes clean gym

Boa!

text: The gym is super clean and the staff are amazing.

resp.text: Thank you! We really appreciate hearing that!!!

name: Juan Hernandez
text: Really good place for exercise,very clean,good service,7/24  the best my favorite gym.

name: B G
text: I like the month to month option and free training session .staff super helpful especially Heaven at gardendale loc she was great w/ my elderly dad and myself .Clean gym good equipment.

name: Benjamin Dover
text: Great gym, great people and great equipment! If you are looking for a local gym, this is it. Sign up, you won’t be sorry.

name: Cris Galang
text: This place is a joke. My husband cancelled his membership due to the pandemic and had to call his credit card company to stop this place from taking any more money disguised as "penalties". A few months later they are still sending us letters asking for more money since they can't debit his card anymore. Be careful when you cancel your membership cause this place will not make it easy for you, at all.

resp.text: Hi Cris! This doesn't sound quite right, in what you are describing. We would love to look into this further but are having troubles finding your husband in our database. Please reach out to us at customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com and we will gladly review this matter. Customer service is no joking matter to us and if he is/was a member, we would like to turn any negative experience into a positive. Thank you!

name: Nathan Luster
text: Not a bad place to work out. It's clean and open 24/7 which is great. Only negative drawback is that a lot of times people come in and and sit on work out equipment for long amounts of time while they check their phone without actually working out. Everyone's allowed to work out however they choose obviously. However, it gets a little frustrating when you want to be in and out of the gym in less than an hour but people are taking up pieces of equipment for over 15-20 minutes while they play on their phone.

resp.text: Thanks Nathan! If there's anything we can do to earn five stars, let us know! We are always striving to improve and learn how we might better serve our members.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Best gym in the Birmingham area hands down!

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! Great to hear!!

name: Tyler Tumlin
text: Clean, good selection of equipment, and awesome staff.  24 hr access so you can choose anytime you need to go

resp.text: Thanks Tyler! We greatly value having you as a member here!

name: Clay Sorensen
text: Absolutely amazing environment! The people are always so inviting. Gerard Younger is an asset to 24e! He is always excited to help! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Clay!! We are grateful to have Gerard on the 24e team!!

name: Justin Long
text: Great gym

resp.text: Thanks Justin! So glad to have you at 24e and knowing you are enjoying it! If we can earn five stars let us know! Customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: Curtis Schultz
text: Very well kept and clean. Staff is awesome and not pushy at all. Great assortment of equipment and free weights, and KBs and machines. Dumbbell go up to 150. Gym for all

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Curtis! Glad to have you at 24e!!

name: josh baty
text:
I have been a member here now for a little over 3 years and I am in there during peak hours about 4 to 5 times a week.  This place is great!! It is clean, weights and machines are well-maintained and the staff are friendly and always willing to help and to answer questions.  This place is not as intimidating as other gyms I have been to. Also they offer free classes and tanning. All in all I would say check it out if you haven't already.  Great place to
work out!!!

resp.text: Thanks Josh! We are so thankful for our wonderful members. Its a pleasure to serve you!

name: steven goodall
text: Nice facility great staff. But the place is kind of small for the amount of people that go there. Gets difficult to use equipment during peak hours and after hours you run into issues with some of the members acting like the place belongs to them only. But you can’t blame 24e for that. All in all I like the place and the staff just could be bigger.

resp.text: Hi Steven! Thanks for the review! We greatly value you as a member and appreciate this feedback.

name: David Dabbs
text: I have been a member for about 2 years. I love this gym. The staff is super helpful and extremely knowledgeable. They truly offer something for everyone. The members themselves set the gym apart from other gyms. Everybody there is so nice and courteous. I traveled a lot for work and have visited other gyms across the southeast, and this is the best...by far. Do yourself a favor and try this gym.

name: Laura Wood
text: Love it! It's clean and has friendly knowledgeable staff. Great place to go

resp.text: Thanks Laura! We're glad to have you at 24e!!

name: Gray Randall
text: Very knowledgeable staff and 24 hour availability. Cleanliness and great equipment. If you're looking for Fitness classes they have the best available and schedule to fit your busy day.

resp.text: Thank you, Gary!!

name: Jessica Lavies
text: I love 24e it has been my gym family since they opened. The staff is great and they have options for everyone! They have great group fitness classes to motivate even the newest member. My favorite gym by far.

resp.text: Hi Jessica! You are such an awesome member and we are grateful for you  -- Thank you!!

name: Cam Scott
text: Great equipment to keep you fit, good atmosphere

resp.text: Thanks Cam! So glad you are enjoying it!

name: charity hardiman
text: Up to date equipment and cardio machines.  Well maintained and clean.  Staff is Great!  I give it a big thumbs Up! 👍

name: Kris Wesley
text: The new facility is fabulous.  The staff members are very nice and helpful.  I love all the equipment and love how its all new and up to date!  The workout classes are wonderful and the teachers that teach them are so nice.  They really have a passion for their class they are teaching! If your looking for a great gym to join at a really good price this is the gym for you if you live near the Gardendale area

name: Jacob Sides
text: 24e in Gardendale is a great place to workout. They offer many different classes throughout the day that targets any type of workout from high cardio to yoga. They’ve utilized their space very well to where the gym doesn’t seemed to be cramped. The staff is always very friendly and helpful when you walk in the door. I’ve been a very happy member!

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob!! Honored to have you as a member!

name: Meredith Carter
text: I’ve been a member since 24e Gardendale  opened and it’s great! Nice staff, always clean and the machines are kept up well.

resp.text: Thanks Meredith! We are so incredibly thankful for our members and look forward to continuing to serve you on your fitness journey!!

name: Christopher Mckinney
text: Should be higher 🌟 but you suck and limited me.  Good guys operate the gym Gerard and Brent are awesome dudes.  Clean gym well operated.

resp.text: Thanks Chris! Very honored to be serving such fantastic members like you!!

name: Chuck Jaeger
text: The renovation to the building looks really good. The hard work and the wait shows the attention paid to details. All new equipment and helpful staff are much appreciated. Having a facebook presence and actually answering customer questions and emails shows the willingness of keeping the customer happy. I will  be glad to come back and give 5 stars once they demonstrate that they can continue to provide great services for the length of an annual membership!

name: Tyrus Johnson
text: Great gym the employees are very nice

name: Kurt Lange
text: Great gym. Nice equipment. Clean. Good environment. Nice staff.

name: Luke Wood
text:
Luke Wood

24e is legit. Great equipment, great well trained staff, clean and plenty of space to get a great work out. Plenty of machines, free weights and cardio equipment. I am very pleased with the service I have received. I would highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a great 24 hour work out facility.

name: N Lashes
text: All I can say is that 24e Fitness Gardendale was worth the wait! I LOVE this place! The staff is always extremely nice and helpful! Super clean and they have anything that you could possibly need in a workout facility!

name: Traci S. Rugged
text: Instagram @sorugged

name: Ashley Anderson
text: Awesome facility and the staff is great. Brett has been a huge help pointing me in the right direction to meet my firness goals

name: Lyndsey Ragland
text: As a participate and instructor I can't say enough good things about 24e. From the managers and staff, to equipment, classes and instructors it truly is a great place to workout!

name: Nick Thompson
text: Really clean and plenty of equipment to use even when it's crowded. 24/7 access is a huge plus too. I probably won't attend any of the classes, but they have a huge selection at various times to try to accommodate everyone.

name: Erica Ashford
text: State of the art equipment, really nice facility!  It would be five star, if guests were greeted with a smile and energy.

name: Gail McWilliams
text: Really enjoying the new gym and the Group Fitness classes!  The staff has been very friendly and the place looks awesome!

name: Keyton Hull
text: My favorite place to work out;  very clean and friendly

resp.text: Thanks Keyton!! Its our pleasure, and we are thankful for our members!!

name: Manny Lopez
text: Great facility, plenty of equipment and a variety of group excercise classes are available. Only complaint/suggestion would be to have sanitize stations for wiping off equipment after use.

name: Maxine Wade
text: Always clean.  Great staff.

name: Jared Lankford
text: This place is super nice, very clean, and the staff is very professional. Actually about to head there right now!

name: Jared Lankford
text: This place is super nice, very clean, and the staff is very professional. Actually about to head there right now!

name: Owen Finley
text:
I have been with the Group Fitness Staff for 2 years and when I found out they were going to the new gym 24e, I went and signed up that day. The new staff plus all the Group Fitness Staff are all amazing. I love that gym. It is the best thing that could ever happen in Gardendale. iF YOU HAVENT JOINED, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING ON? I have a free pass if you want to try it out. Everyday is exciting at 24e Gardendale.

Thank you to everyone that had a part in making 24e happen!!

Jeff Finley

name: Roy Jones
text: Great gym great staff and clean

name: Sonya Franklin
text: Clean, nice staff and great equipment

name: Austin
text: Scamming people is immoral and fraudulent.

resp.text: Hi Austin! We see where you were a member back in 2016, but ran into an issue with your account. We'd love to work with you, get you back into the club, and help you reach your fitness goals. If we can be of assistance, please email us at customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: Lauren Faustmann
text: The don't have wifi when the manager is not working so unless you like staring at black walls don't join!

name: Shannon Magers McNamee
text:
I attended the Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp For Women several years ago and loved every minute of it. I stopped attending because of a move to Birmingham. (I’m hoping one day Joe and his family will relocate! :0) ) I never found a great boot camp in Birmingham and ended up joining a gym, but never felt the support and accountability I did while attending HABC. After the pandemic hit, I didn’t feel comfortable going back to the gym and still don’t. Luckily I saw one of Joe’s posts about his online workouts and I signed up right away. I love these online workouts! They are 30 minutes, 4 times a week and so thorough. I feel like I get a great overall workout. Joe takes the time to explain each exercise to make sure you are doing it correctly and gives options for all fitness levels. He also checks in with you to offer support and answer any questions you may have.
If you are looking for a fresh, healthy start - contact Joe today. He’s got a program that will be able to help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Shannon! I'm very grateful to have the opportunity to work with you again.

name: Claire Aiello
text:
I love Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women. I've been going for several years, and it's given me a whole new outlook on life, health, and exercise. Joe Martin is positive, upbeat, and has a daily joke for us (we sometimes laugh) - but the important part is, he keeps us motivated and we motivate each other.

If you don't have your health, you don't have anything. Really! You have to take time for yourself and keep fit.  Or you can't take care of anyone else. Take this time out for yourself -- you are worth it!

Also, if you're hesitant to join because you might think the class is like a "military-style" boot camp, it's not. It is doable and fun.  Every day is different. You'll make some of the best friends, too.  We all support each other -- come join us!

resp.text: Thank you so much Claire! I am now going to hire you to do my marketing :) Because you nailed it! Lift each other up, offer encouragement, and move forward together.

name: Hillary Dunham
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is absolutely a breath of fresh air for workout plans. If you want to be surrounding with people who are real, funny, encouraging and kind, this is the best place for you! Joe will always  bring relentless positivity and constantly offer different ways to keep your body moving. No crazy diets, no fads, just simple and effective ways to keep moving without feeling bad about whatever place you are currently in. You will not regret any time spend at Boot Camp with friends and with Joe. It's a great investment in yourself and I'm so glad I made it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary! When gingers combine forces amazing things happen :)

name: Kari Fox
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is the best! It’s is well suited for any age woman of any fitness level. Joe offers many convenient times, he is great at keeping me motivated and he is loads of fun! I’ve been participating for a year and can definitely tell a difference in my muscle tone and energy level. I highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kari, I appreciate you!

name: Elizabeth Riggle
text: I came across information on Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp & Joe Martin at a time when I was frustrated and stressed with changes that Covid had created in my life.  I was eating my way through it & not exercising.  I decided to give the program a try.  Great decision!  Joe offers virtual workouts which is great.  He does them live, but also sends you a link, so you can do them at a time that is convenient for you.  You have no excuse not to do the workout.  He designs workouts for all fitness levels.  He demonstrates options for the exercises for beginners to those wanting a challenge.  In the past I would get bored exercising & end up quitting, especially at holiday time until this year.  I started in June & have stuck with it.  Joe is a wonderful coach who truly cares & wants to help you become a healthier & happier you.  He sends several emails a week filled with encouragement & motivation.  If you are struggling let him know & he will work with you.  He is always willing to answer questions about nutrition & exercise.

resp.text: What an awesome review Elizabeth, I am blown away! Thank you so much

name: Magen Sanders
text: In the past have been guilty of never sticking with a program or workout. However, with Joe's boot camp I have stayed inspired! Everyday is a different workout that keeps my body from getting too fatigued and my mind alert. The ladies at the classes should also be noted as welcoming and great proof that this is an uplifting community of people who care about health and well being. Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you so much Magen! And you nailed it. The ladies in the class are what separates us from other gyms. Stronger together, all are welcome!

name: Annie Phillips
text: I have been attending HABC for about a year and a half, and it is one of the best things I have ever done, both for my physical and my mental health. Joe Martin leads us through our exercise with warmth and fun and fellowship. If you can't do a certain exercise the traditional way, he offers alternatives for your needs. I have met so many wonderful women who I call friends, and Joe is a dear friend now too. Do something life-giving for yourself in 2021 and join us!

resp.text: The gift that keeps on giving! Like the Jelly of the Month Club :) Thank you so much for the kinds words Annie, it is definitely more than just an exercise class.

name: Amy Slamp
text: If you are woman looking for a great place to work out with other women and a fun and inspiring leader, this is the place for you.  Joe Martin makes  doing a workout at 5:30 am something you want to get up for.  I have developed some great friends I would not have gotten to know otherwise, and every day Joe shares a funny "Dad" joke so what better way to start your day.

resp.text: So grateful you are a part of the HABC Family Amy!

name: Patti Blacklock
text: Joe Martin's Huntsville Adventure Book Camp for Women is a great option for women of all fitness levels to get in shape physically and nutritionally. The boot camps are fun and challenging, and Joe, along with my fellow boot camps, offer encouragement and motivation that keeps me working toward my fitness and nutrition goals so that I am as healthy as I can be.

resp.text: Thank you, Patti it has been awesome having the opportunity to work with you for so long. Here's to many more years together!

name: Donna Van Berkom
text: Joe is an excellent trainer.  He gives various options depending on your workout level.  Exercises are geared towards total body workouts, balance and cardio.   Joe helps you set your goals and meet them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for being a part of the Adventure Boot Camp family DVB! I'm so glad I get to work with you again even if we can't meet face to face.

name: Joy Wiseman
text: Changing lives one burpee at a time! Seriously the most fun workouts I have ever done! Joe is motivating and the other ladies very supportive. You will not regret joining, even with squats and burpees... 5 more seconds and funny dad jokes!

resp.text: Thank you so much Joy! Burpees have been banned by the CDC, so we should be ok going forward :)

name: Chelsea Bell
text: I’ve lost 50lbs in 7 months following Joe’s program! Huntsville Adventure Bootcamp provides me an effective program, tips/tricks for changing my bad habits and I actually look forward to working out every day.

resp.text: So proud you Chelsea! You have done amazing and you continue to get better. Keep up the great work!

name: amy burnette
text: I have been going to Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp, for over a year now and by far the best place to workout for women. The atmosphere is so welcoming, supportive, encouraging, motivating, and positive. The workouts are always different, so you never get bored and have something to look forward to each time. Your fitness level doesn't matter, Joe incorporates a way for all to benefit whether your just beginning your journey or needing a challenge. I drive over thirty minutes one way to attend and love every minute of Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp. HABC is not like other gyms, in that it gives you a sense of family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! I'm so proud of how far you've come since you started. You are a rock star!

name: Kristine Maness
text: It’s more than a great workout. It’s a great support system. I’ve met some of my closest friends here. Joe is the BEST cheerleader/trainer. He encourages and supports us in everything, both inside and outside of class. Can’t imagine not having HABC as part of my life.

resp.text: You just pretty much wrote out my mission statement for me! Thank you so much, I can't imagine HABC without you.

name: Wendy Smythe
text: HABC is a great place to workout and make life long friends.  Joe always has a positive and encouraging attitude and philosophy and gladly welcomes all who strive to get healthy and feel better.  Exercises and programs can be adapted to meet individual needs that provide results for everyone who participates.  I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wendy, I really appreciate the kind words! All are welcome at the house of awesome :)

name: Gay Schill
text: Joe got me moving again!   Great workouts understands limitations and works with you.  I could barely get up off the floor now i am getting stronger day by day and was able to get up today after only a week without so much pain.  So thankful I have found him!

resp.text: I'm so thankful you started too! Stronger every day :)

name: Claudinette Purifoy-Fears
text: One of the best decisions I ever made. The workouts can be modified to accommodate fitness level. Love working out in the company of positive and uplifting women. Going on year 9!

resp.text: Thank you Claudinette! I really appreciate your loyalty and commitment after all these years. You are awesome!

name: Laura Lynn Hardy
text: Very welcoming atmosphere! Structured workouts that can be varied to your ability and strength level. Joe is a great coach and motivator. I've kicked things up for myself in a way that I would not do on my own at a gym.

resp.text: Thank you so much Laura Lynn! Keep up the great work.

name: Jess R
text: Just beginning but so far HABC has been great. Great workouts that aren’t daunting, no high pressure to be perfect or already in great shape, customizes each exercise to benefit ladies at all fitness levels, friendly environment. I can feel it working already. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jess, so glad you started coming!

name: Leigh Holeman
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women is awesome! Joe is a good leader who really cares about you. The workouts are excellent, and are always new and different - you won't get bored here! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much No E! So glad you are part of the HABC family.

name: Tory Green
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women has been a real game changer for me.  Joe is a patient and kind trainer who actually makes exercise fun.  I have made life-long friends in this class as well.  Sign up!  You won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tory! Life-long friends and buffness. What more could you ask for? :)

name: Cairenn Martin
text: Women of all ages can benefit from Adventure Boot Camp.  Joe makes exercising fun! He is also very knowledgeable about physical fitness so his sessions are well balanced for strength and cardio. I highly recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I hear the owner's mom is the BEST.

name: Ashley Gray
text: HABC is the only exercise program I have stuck with and actually look forward to going to! Joe is the best coach! He offers a variety workouts for all fitness levels, and believe it or not makes the workout FUN! If you enjoy hanging out with a group of women (and one man) who are getting up before the sun or showing up after a long day because they are motivated to just be better, HABC is where you belong!

resp.text: You guys make it fun for me! I take it as a huge honor that people take an hour out of their day to spend at HABC. And I hear people there wear the coolest shirts.

name: Deborah Holt
text: I absolutely love this exercise program. Joe Martin is an incredible person who truly enjoys helping others with exercise and making the healthier food choices; and his daily jokes are hysterical.

resp.text: I am blessed to be able to do what I do for a living. I love it! And thank you for recognizing the hilarity of the jokes, I work really hard on them :)

name: Laurali Hollister
text: I am a big fan of Joe's bootcamp.  His knowledge keeps you exercising no matter what kind of issue you might have.  You control how strenuous you want to work out and there's lots of laughter, fun and encouragement from your fellow bootcampers.  When I can be consistent I'm in great physical shape.

resp.text: So glad to have you back Laurali! You're a big part of making that laughter happen. And not just because you talk to yourself :)

name: Ashley DeHaye
text: Joe works hard to keep fitness accessible and make workouts not boring. He also genuinely cares about the people he works with and will always go the extra mile to make sure they are successful.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! I really appreciate you being part of the HABC family.

name: Wendy Hnetynka
text: Coach Joe Martin is truly committed to the overall fitness and well-being of his boot campers. The atmosphere is always fun, friendly and encouraging. The workout routines are never repetitive. They are designed to encourage consistent participation by keeping you entertained and motivated. Great music, friendships and even a joke of the day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Wendy, you are awesome!

name: Elena Aiello
text: Fantastic program! I've been doing this for a year and it's changed my life for the better. It's changed my view on exercise/fitness - which should be fun, not something you dread. Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is fun - I look forward to going every day. Joe Martin makes it different and challenging. No day is ever the same. He's the best -- and the ladies are wonderful. We all support each other and you do things at your level. If you feel like challenging yourself, go for it. Joe will give you different levels to try for each exercise. He's awesome and very supportive. You will be supported by everyone there.

resp.text: Thank you so much! You nailed a lot of the things I hold near and dear to my heart about boot camp. We are family!

name: Susan Presley
text: Joe is a great motivator and even starts each class off with a joke. He keeps the classes fun.

resp.text: Thank you so much Susan! And the joke is ALWAYS hilarious.

name: Mary Ottman - Leadership Speaker & Certified Coach
text: Joe is a fantastic trainer.  I couldn't do one ONE push-up when I started, and he never made me feel like I was "behind" the rest of the class.  He is always super supportive and has a wealth of knowledge and ways to modify exercises to your skill level.  Newbies train next to serious exercisers, and everybody feels like they are part of his tribe.  His wife and his mom both come to some of the classes too, and that makes it a cool family vibe.  He plays great music and he is always super positive.  In addition, he lets us know about local exercise events and we have the opportunity to be part of his team, helping the community, i.e. the Liz Hurley 5K.  Everyone is welcome to join in.  Another huge plus is that the ladies in the classes are SO friendly and supportive!! It truly is a tribe of supportive women (and Joe!) who want to be the best versions of themselves! I couldn't recommend this boot camp any higher! It is awesome!!! 💗💕💖💗💕💖

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary! It was your hard work that made it happen. Proud to call you my friend!

name: Donna Baughn
text: I didn’t know what to expect when I signed up for a month of boot camp. After not exercising for years I was not in any shape to flip tires or push a sled. But that wasn’t what it was like at all. Joe gives me modified versions of the exercise when I need it based on my fitness level. I never feel like I can’t do something but I am amazed daily at how much more I can do since starting boot camp. Best part is that exercise is now part of my daily life and I look forward to boot camp each and every day because each day is different.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Donna! I can't imagine having class without you now, you rock star you.

name: Marie Ferguson
text: Don't let the words "Boot Camp" scare you.  It's fun, challenging, inspiring and just an all around good time.  You will meet an amazing group of women who will do anything to keep you and each other motivated.  They make me laugh every day.  Joe scales the work outs for every level of fitness.  When I first started I couldn't imagine how everyone was doing the exercises and carrying on a conversation, now I'm cutting up as much as anyone.  Probably the most fun you can legally have at 5:30 in the morning.  Give a try, you might just love it!!

resp.text: You are a big part of why it is fun and inspirational Marie, so glad you are a part of the boot camp family!

name: Erina at Work
text: You will not find a nicer, more dedicated fitness coach than Joe Martin and these boot camp sessions are not only very effective but they are a lot of fun. Joe is truly committed to helping women meet their health and fitness goals but he understands it's important to do it with humor and humility.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina! It is always fun to work with you.

name: Heather Thacker
text: If you want to get stronger, leaner, feel better AND laugh your head off, this boot camp is for you.  Joe Martin is the leader of this crew and is the best in his field.  All ages and sizes were in my classes and everyone loved it!

resp.text: Thank you Heather, that is very kind of you!

name: Jessica Burton
text: Joe is amazing! He genuinely cares about everyone! His workouts are always different and creative. His jokes are great too!! I definitely would recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica, so glad you are a part of the HABC family!

name: Crystal Hanson
text: I began hoping to complete a month. 18 months later I'm still at it! I've been encouraged, cheered for, welcomed at whatever fitness level I am at. If I'm absent, I'm missed. I've never had more fun getting healthy! I love this program! And Joe is one of a kind!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! It has been awesome seeing you continue to improve, actually enjoy exercise, and learn more about music from you :) Keep up the great work!

name: Kimberly Widner
text: Best health decision I have ever made! Joe has created an environment that is welcoming, supportive and challenging. I have never enjoyed exercising but Joe makes it fun!

resp.text: I'm so thankful for your review Kim! That is my goal in life, to get people enjoying exercise. Thank you for being a part of the HABC family!

name: Becky Phillips
text: Best decision Ive made regarding my health! Its a go at your own pace class in a group setting.  Everyone is so encouraging and fun to be around.  Joe Martin is a great instructor, always switching things up and keeps it fresh and always good for a laugh.  Thank you Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! You have done and continue to do amazing. Grateful to have you as a client!

name: Joanne Long
text: Fun, fabulous and uplifting. Getting healthy and making friends at the same time, completely non threatening since it's all women of different ages shapes and sizes, except Joe of course, but he came to the dark side a long time ago and can easily manage to not lose his cool when talking about sweaty female parts!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Joanne! I think...

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Joe is the best!  Very motivating and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you so much Patty, you are awesome!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: If you are looking for a great fitness option, then Joe Martin and his team at Adventure Bootcamp is the right place to go.  I have been involved in several of his workouts and know that they are not only effective and fun, but also easy to jump into at every level.  Highly recommend you check out his website or call Joe Martin to get signed up.

resp.text: Thank you Dr. Porter, really appreciate the kind words!

name: Leigh Anne McMahon
text: HABC offers up an inclusive and safe environment for women on all fitness levels and ages to get up, get moving, get stronger, get results.  Joe's program has made all the difference for me, helping me get leaner and making me a much stronger runner.  He is relentlessly positive and does an excellent job of keeping things fresh and interesting.  You won't meet a better group of women to exercise with and get support from either.  Five stars, without a doubt!

resp.text: Thank you so much LA! You're the bee's knees :)

name: Marie Held
text: Wonderful way to get your daily exercise in.

resp.text: Thank you Marie, so glad you are a part of that daily exercise!

name: Erina Galloway
text: If you don't like going to the gym (me) and really enjoy being outside (me) this is the boot camp for you. It's fun without losing the challenge of getting in shape. You are driven and pushed but through laughter and motivation, not just from the fearless leader (Joe) but the many amazing people you will encounter.  Do yourself a favor and try it out, you won't regret it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina, you are awesome!

name: Brianne Oleson
text: Fun and great place to get your workout on!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brianne, so glad you are a part of the boot camp fam!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Want to change your way of working out? Come to HABC with Joe Martin! It is a fun and effective workout - just show up, do what Joe says (if you can hear him over the gossip and giggling - LOL) and give it all you got. Wonderful group of ladies and Joe's got jokes!

resp.text: The jokes are so hilarious! I can't stress enough how hilarious they are. Thank you so much Nancy, you are a rock star.

name: Monica Sanford
text: Joe is amazing!  His classes are fun but you still get a great workout.  If you're sitting in the fence and wonder if you should try HABC...wonder no more.  Just do it!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 start review Monica! And that is great advice for getting started with HABC.

name: Vickie Blacklock
text: Get to exercise with old friends and new. Diverse and challenging workouts that are different everyday. Great for mind, body and soul! Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Vickie!

name: Aquita Wherry
text: Great motivator! Work outs are fun whether indoors or out.  Great knowledge and great fun

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Aquita!

name: Kellie Andrews
text: Joe Martin creates a challenging workout experience with fun and encouragement and new friends. If anything is holding you back from getting healthy, you should give Boot Camp a try. It's a party with friends where you get fit!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kellie! I really like your description of our classes  too :)

name: Jade Gann
text: Joe is awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jade! Takes awesome to know awesome.

name: Sherri Stroud
text: Joining an exercise program can be daunting, joining a "Boot Camp" is terrifying...until you find Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!  Joe Martin is more than a boot camp instructor, he is a personal trainer, nutritionist and a friend to all his clients. He offers a program that suits all fitness levels and all age ranges and somehow manages to be crazy fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherri! Exercise doesn't have to be misersable to be effective. Looking forward to more awesome with you in the future!

name: Eula Pugh
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is a great place to get into shape, loose weight and be around encouraging women while you are on your healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: So proud of how far you have come Eula, you are doing awesome!

name: Vicky Mathis
text: Fun and exciting workout that doesn't feel like work at all - until you feel the burn later!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Vicky!

name: Rena Strange
text: Awesome Boot Camp!  Great atmosphere, professional support, fun way to get in shape.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Rena!

name: Marcie Lewis
text: I have been doing boot camp for 10 years and I cannot say enough about how much I love it!

resp.text: Boot Camp OG! So glad you are still coming after all these years :)

name: Amanda Pope
text: Such a great way to workout - it is FUN, not work!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amanda! Exercise doesn't have to be miserable, so glad you enjoyed the workouts.

name: Junior Pruitt
text: Since Jesse has taken charge,  things have greatly improved and I'm looking forward to seeing great things at this location.

name: Corey Johnson
text: Joined this gym a few months ago and it's very convenient,  clean, and it's not a hassle to get in touch with management if I need to. Would def recommend to anyone who is looking for a more so small gym that's not too noisy and with friendly members!!

name: Sherri Wallace
text: The new manager Rodney has FIXED all of my billing issues! After trying to cancel my membership for a whole two months, the new manager has totally fixed everything, reassured me that it will never happen again & gave me a complimentary 2 free months

name: McKenzie Bates
text: One of the best gyms that's close to my house

name: Michelle Constance
text: I had a membership at Calera Snap Fitness for probably about a year. Management is very poor at communicating, taking care of equipment, and canceling your membership when requested. I canceled my membership in May of 2020 and still got billed for June, July, and August. I had to put a stop payment on my account and they changed their merchant name so they could start billing me again. I am not the only one this was done to. Since my email in May I was also contacted two other times about my membership and needing payment. I reiterated that my account should already be canceled and they proceeded to tell me it is now canceled but do not mention a word about my refund.

name: Kristina Stephens
text: This gym is horrible. If I could give it negative stars I would. Initially I had to drop by several times for someone to be there for me to join. I should have known then that this was a terrible establishment.  I've been trying to cancel my membership since March and yet I can't get in contact with anyone to do that. I've called and left voicemails and even emailed with no response. I'm simply fed up. On top of that half the machines didn't work and the cable was off half the time. Don't waste your time or money here.

name: Fabio Alnaham
text: The WORST membership you will EVER subscribe to . This is highway robbery and for many reason . The employees were rude on the first day I went to get my membership. Also I've been stuck with a membership that I've been trying to cancel for more than a year now. I have attempted EVERYTHING to try and get in contact with them to cancel it. I have left countless voicemails with all my contact information and I have not been contacted at all. I have went in person and no one was even there. The point is they take your money and avoid you at ALL costs from trying to get it cancelled. Its not just me that had this issue but two other friends as well. I highly do not recommend this gym at all . Any other gym is wayyyyy better then this. Save your money and save yourself some headaches and look somewhere else.

name: Joey Thomason
text: Purchased membership online. Have not been able to get into the gym once. Door is locked. Apparently the water has been cut off, the staff has all quit, the  phone doesn’t work, and the owner has been AWOL for months. I’ve paid for a membership and am literally unable to use it or cancel it. Going to charge back the original payment and block any future payments.

name: Anna Hopson
text: For a “24-7” gym... THEYRE NEVER OPEN!!!

name: joe cox
text: The new manager Pamela has turned this place around. We stopped going to this location while ago because it was filthy and dark. Now she has cleaned everything spotless and much brighter. She also enforces that everyone entering must be a member. Really like the new atmosphere. From 1 star to 5 star. Recommend

name: NaturalBornSpartans
text: Mis-managed hot garbage

name: janny leson
text: They will not fix broken equipment. Manager has a BAD attitude problem (a lot of people talk about this all the time). She has smart attitude with employees and its sad to act that way in front of customers. We all see it regularly. How do you even have a job lady?

name: karen tortorigi
text:
Can not recommend this location as long as the manager (Karen) is still there.
I called and spoke with her to cancel membership in May said she would.
DID NOT HAPPEN. My bank acct was charged 30.00. Called back left VM and email. NO RESPONSE. I have had issues before I cancelled of her not responding to my emails or VM said she was having trouble with emails what about VM pretty sad if cant get to the MANAGER.
I have another 30.00 charged for July so I'm trying to get my money back .
Called CORPORATE

name: Alison Boothe
text: I have only been a member since February 2018 and out of all the gyms I've been apart of I've never been treated so special as I am at this Snap Fitness.  Miss Pamela, Snap Fitness Calera, AL gym manager always says hello and makes me feel special! I have met so many nice people!  A huge thank you and appreciation to Rick Anderson, Snap Fitness Calera, AL Personal Trainer for without his guidance, positive enthusiasm, and extensive knowledge and experience i couldn't have lost the so far 40 lbs since I joined the gym in February.  The members and staff make this gym by far the best gym I've ever had the pleasure to be a part of!

name: Lindsey Davis
text:
The facility it's self is nice enough not exactly clean but its a gym....  the staff is awful, other members of the gym showed me equipment, how to use the key pass, and tanning bed.
the hours they have posted of the website mean nothing I had to call 3 times between 9 - 11 before I could get someone to answer. The women there, pamela could not answer any of my questions without asking "the guys" I assume she meant management or perhaps an owner and when I requested to cancel my membership she insisted that I come to the location. When I made her aware that it wasn't possible for me to get there or even leave my home she was persistent in finding out why as if it was any of her business and still refused to cancel my membership after calling 5 times in a month I eventually had to cancel my credit card to keep them from charging me.

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: I live it except for the darn music they play. Great selection of workout equipment, kept clean, nice employees,   and quiey. Just horrible music

name: James Jackson
text: Friendliest staff and cleanest gym you will ever visit with lots of cardio and strength training options!

name: Danny Barbee
text: I have called several times to inguire about joining. Voicemail says someone will return call within 24 hours. Never happened! Went there yesterday and only one person was there and he wouldn’t even come to the door. I guess they don’t need any more members. My guess is this place will not be in business much longer.

name: Gary Johnston
text: Nice and quiet place to work out.

name: Tommy Harris
text: Never really crowded. The work out equipment may have problems from time to time, but they do their best to fix them.

name: Melissa Martin
text: The place has went down since we join alot of stuff needs to be fixed. Ask for another key and been waiting  a month and also the workout  room has not work for a year

name: C S

text: I've been with this gym since 2012 and no complaints. Love the free weights, space and ability to come at any time of the day. text: This is a great gym. The staff is great. Very friendly people and like to make sure they have relationships with their members. It’s a little more than PF black card but well worth the price. Everyone that goes wants to work and better themselves.

text: Luv 24e! It's a modern 'old school' style gym. Fantastic equipment & lots of it! Also lot of free weights! Open 24 hrs which is so awesome for those of us who work weird hours. Staff is great! always cheerful &  happy to assist!  Luv this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina!

name: Tommie Wisaeu
text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Trent!! So thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

text: This gym is great for anyone. The environment is very nice, with a good mix of beginners up to series bodybuilders. Mix of older and newer equipment which is very well maintained. Staff is friendly and helpful. I have and would recommend this gym to anyone. Gym gets fairly busy later in the day from 4-6pm but never to busy to get on the machines and weights you want to use. The best part is you can workout any time any day. For the most part there is always a few people working out.

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Nannette Zeanah
text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well.  I couldn't have done it without the help of the staff and trainers.  I train with Hugheston at present.  He's amazing and very knowledgeable.  He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

text: Reliable equipment, clean, incredible coaches. Focused on improvement and providing for the members. As fun as working out can be.

name: Edward Melendez
text:
Iron Tribe Fitness (ITF) is a holistic CrossFit high impact cardio strength wellness gym. They have a keen Focus on their customers with Coaches that take time with each person. They dedicate themselves to learning their craft and ensure a total body workout.  They also peach a total body wellness from breakfast to snacks to dinner.  As stated today it's what you put in at the gym and kitchen that makes a healthy body.

The biggest compliment I must give is from the owner to the coaching staff they are all sincere and willing to work with you.  No matter your personal level of health or gym knowledge they will guide you.

What won me over was there Core Values. See the photos to read them. Specifically, " We connect God's blessings with Purpose."

Although they have 5 stars there are still areas for improvement.  The men's shower area could be improved.  Storage for personal belongings could also be updated. I must agree with others on the $500 deposit. If it wasn't that I already had friends going here I wouldn't have known about it until I got there. However, I see the point that they are giving up time to work with you and need some kind of guarantee that you'll be back and not wasting their time. With so many people with gym memberships that never go I get it.

Multiple photos uploaded to see the gym itself.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Edward! We appreciate it!

name: Aaron Phillips
text: Great staff. Caters to your needs and health condition.

name: Laura Satcher
text: Accomplished more in 6 weeks than I did on my own in decades!

name: Kristin Marie
text: Love this place!! Amazing trainers and amazing quality fitness at a price I can afford.. I'm so thankful I am apart of this!

name: Deanna Whitehead
text: I love how supportive and encouraging everyone is!

name: Steph Wilkins
text: Iron Tribe is truly a life changing experience. From the time I was a teenager until the age of 30, I have obsessed over my weight on a scale. Iron Tribe not only taught me how to live a healthy life style, but they also coached me on how to have a healthy relationship with food. All coaches are so  encouraging and motivating. This has been a life changing experience and I am so thrilled to continue this healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: We're so thrilled by your consistent efforts and improvement! Thank you for your beautiful testimonial!

name: Kendra Creamer
text: Iron Tribe has been an awesome experience for me. I completed the 6 week challenge and am very pleased with the results that I have gotten thus far. I have lost 10% of my body fat within that 6 weeks. The meal plan and workouts are challenging but worth it. You have 2 coaches at each class helping you work on the fundamentals and encouraging you to push yourself.  They encourage you to ask questions if you are unsure of the movements and make you feel comfortable. Very welcoming staff, gym and fellow athletes.

resp.text: We're so proud of you! Thank you for the review, Kendra!

name: Carrie Cowperthwait
text: I joined Iron Tribe Madison for the 6 week challenge and had THE BEST experience! I was provided a detailed meal plan with lots of options, created specifically for me and my fitness goals. The challenge also included at least 3 workouts per week. The trainers were amazing! They were very helpful, as I had never done this type of workout before, and very encouraging/motivating. As a triathlete, I found this be to be a great off-season training opportunity. Overall, I highly recommend Iron Tribe. They more than exceeded my expectations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Carrie! We're so glad you've enjoyed your experience!

name: Cockatoo Lover AJPW
text: I have ran marathons, and done a lot of different workouts; but nothing can come close to comparing to Iron Tribe. This is more than a gym. This is tailored to your fitness goals and health needs. Nothing has ever worked better or as quickly as the six week challenge! If you want real results, this is a game changer! The meal plan, personal coaching, and accountability cannot be beat. I am hooked!

resp.text: So glad we hooked you! Thank you for the review, Jaclyn!

name: Ashley Barnes
text: Iron Tribe Fitness is a great place to workout. I recently took on a 6 week challenge for the first time. All of the coaches are awesome and very supportive. The workouts are insane, the meal plan was challenging, but it was all worth it. I got great results. It was just the right place to kickstart my fitness journey.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Ash!

name: Firuza Sidhwa
text: I had participated in the ITF 6week fitness challenge. My goal was to lose a certain % body fat during that period. I reached my goal and I feel great after this experience. I was given a meal plan and was trained to eat healthy and workout. The coaches here are awesome and always available for you. My experience with Iron Tribe has been great and I would recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Firuza!

name: Carolyn Myers
text: I'm almost through the 6 week challenge, and I couldn't be happier with the whole experience! All of the coaches are so patient and friendly; they are going to challenge you, but they will make sure you are taking care of your body, too. The accountability, the team spirit, the workouts, the meal plan- I've never been to a place like this before, and I am definitely seeing results. Definitely give it a try!

resp.text: Thanks Carolyn! We appreciate your testimonial!

name: Brett Rogers
text: Don't be fooled by any advertisement you see offering a free six week challenge. They bring you in for a consultation, ask about you and your life, your fitness goals, and then hit you with a sales pitch. Intensity, accountability, and nutrition. Then they ask you to pay 500 dollars in installments of 250 dollars. A deposit they called it, in which you get back at the end of the program, where they then probably pressure you into spending that to join the gym. I've seen the results, I know these guys mean business. Just seemed like false advertising to lure people in.

name: Melissa McCutcheon
text: Best gym. Coaches are caring and motivating. Lots a flexibility with classes to attend throughout the day. Owner truly treats you like family.

resp.text: You ARE family! Thank you for the review, Melissa!

name: Marc Labansky
text: Currently unemployed. They scammed me into coming to a 42 day free "trial" but expected a $500 deposit up front. I'm barely getting by on unemployment and they had the audacity to request payment for a "free 42 day trial". Then it's $199.99 a month afterwards to become a member. I don't appreciate being deceived like that. Even when I do find a job I'll join literally any other gym because at least I'll be able to afford food, membership, car and house expenses, etc. Plus it's not even a 24/7 gym for that much money you should be able to go whenever you want!

name: Stephen Miller
text:
Great atmosphere for success, great staff and coaches that are engaged and invested in our success.  Totally recommend giving the 6 week challenge a shot for beginners.

#6weeksITF.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stephen!

name: Bobbie Powell
text: Iron Tribe Madison has been a life changing experience.  Never in my wildest dreams would I have believed what I could accomplish in a relatively short time.  I led a very sedentary life prior to joining the Tribe but now my energy and productivity have increased exponentially.  I have belonged to other gyms and at one point many years ago had my own personal trainer.  Never did I receive the expert coaching and encouragement that I now enjoy at Iron Tribe Madison.  I can't imagine ever going back to my previous lifestyle and thank God (and my daughter) for leading me to the Tribe!!

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Bobbie!

name: Jeff Gale
text: I just had one of the best workouts of my life. Other crossfit-style gyms I've been to have been kind of shabby. This gym is clean and well organized, and the people were friendly and welcoming. The class started on time. The coaches knew their stuff and made sure I was using good form the whole time, all while pushing me just the right amount. I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Xavier Deleveaux
text: With so much information out there on fitness/ meal planning, it's difficult to find something that's right for you. I shared this challenge with Blair at the start of my six week Iron Tribe fitness journey. I went to the orientation, got my questions answered and got set up to start the program... I took the first fit test on day one... I failed the test (I didn't complete the test within the allotted timeframe). The coaches (yeah, there're coaches there every step of the way) told the class that this is a benchmark test. We will take MINUETS off our time by week three. My pride was hurt (so was my lungs, legs, and everything else), but I kept going to class. They taught me moves (they corrected some of what I thought I knew, and introduced me to a lot of new ones), encouraged me, motivated me, and kept me accountable to every rep. I took the fit test again at the end of week three and completed it in 11:42 sec (down from 17:19)! After that, denying the program was out the window. I signed up and attended classes everyday they were offered (unless I was on travel - I still completed my workouts while TDY - they have travel workouts for you). By the end of the six week trail, I lost 6% of my body fat and gained 5 lbs of muscle! The program is legit, and well worth the efforts.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Xavier! So proud of your dedication and commitment!

name: Chansamone Siharath
text: I’ve never loss this much weight in any 6 week workout/ meal plan. (20lbs)! I could have done a lot better but the work travel threw me off.  Blair, Channing and the ITF crew know their stuff.  From how to eat to the workouts- they got me fit in no time.  They will show you how to workout correctly.  I’ve learned a lot about my body during the corse of the challenge and I would recommend this for everyone looking to change their health and lifestyle.  Thanks ITF fam!

resp.text: Thank YOU for your dedication and testimonial!

name: Mason Hall
text: This is a wonderful environment to work out in. Great classes and trainers. The owner, Blair, is fantastic. They do great nutritional advice too!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Mason!

name: Eric Housh
text: The coaches are very knowledgeable and super cool. The gym is very clean and accommodating. I was particularly impressed with the individual attention and focus on safety. Would highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Myrna Littlewolf
text: Irontribe 6 week challenge is a very tough challenge for anyone that is willing to put forth the effort on making a change in their lifestyle.  The meal plan shows you can still eat great foods, just less carbs so that helped me this challenge. Also, in the plan they give you suggested recipes and most of ones I tried turned out amazing!  With Irontribe, they give two options for the workouts Power and Push (45min classes) and the coaches in each class demonstrates how to correctly perform the moves and alters you if you are doing something wrong to prevent injury. They take the time and effort to help everyone in the class and wants everyone to push themselves but safely and streches beginning and end of the class!  Had a wonderful time with the 6 week challenge, I lost about 15lbs and 7.8% body fat! I remember start of challenge some folks thought I looked like I did not have much to lose, but I feel so much better now and will continue to keep these lifestyles changes and minimal cheat meals:P If you need something different in your life and want to feel and look better personally then Irontribe is meant for you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Myrna!

name: Doug Robley
text: The coaches and athletes are extremely motivating and encouraging.  This is not an intimidating environment, all levels of fitness attend.  My personal fitness and strength has improved and my body and mind are feeling great, thanks to ITF!

resp.text: Thank you
